                     <div class="line">Verona, for a while I take my leave,</div>
                     <div class="line">To see my friends in Padua, but of all</div>
                     <div class="line">My best beloved and approved friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hortensio; and I trow this is his house.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here, sirrah Grumio; knock, I say.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Knock, sir! whom should I knock? is there man has</div>
                     <div class="line">rebused your worship?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Villain, I say, knock me here soundly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Knock you here, sir! why, sir, what am I, sir, that</div>
                     <div class="line">I should knock you here, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Villain, I say, knock me at this gate</div>
                     <div class="line">And rap me well, or I'll knock your knave's pate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My master is grown quarrelsome. I should knock</div>
                     <div class="line">you first,</div>
                     <div class="line">And then I know after who comes by the worst.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will it not be?</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, sirrah, an you'll not knock, I'll ring it;</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll try how you can sol, fa, and sing it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>He wrings him by the ears</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Help, masters, help! my master is mad.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, knock when I bid you, sirrah villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter HORTENSIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How now! what's the matter? My old friend Grumio!</div>
                     <div class="line">and my good friend Petruchio! How do you all at Verona?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Hortensio, come you to part the fray?</div>
                     <div class="line">'Con tutto il cuore, ben trovato,' may I say.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Alla nostra casa ben venuto, molto honorato signor</div>
                     <div class="line">mio Petruchio.' Rise, Grumio, rise: we will compound</div>
                     <div class="line">this quarrel.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, 'tis no matter, sir, what he 'leges in Latin.</div>
                     <div class="line">if this be not a lawful case for me to leave his</div>
                     <div class="line">service, look you, sir, he bid me knock him and rap</div>
                     <div class="line">him soundly, sir: well, was it fit for a servant to</div>
                     <div class="line">use his master so, being perhaps, for aught I see,</div>
                     <div class="line">two and thirty, a pip out? Whom would to God I had</div>
                     <div class="line">well knock'd at first, Then had not Grumio come by the worst.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A senseless villain! Good Hortensio,</div>
                     <div class="line">I bade the rascal knock upon your gate</div>
                     <div class="line">And could not get him for my heart to do it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Knock at the gate! O heavens! Spake you not these</div>
                     <div class="line">words plain, 'Sirrah, knock me here, rap me here,</div>
                     <div class="line">knock me well, and knock me soundly'? And come you</div>
                     <div class="line">now with, 'knocking at the gate'?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, be gone, or talk not, I advise you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio, patience; I am Grumio's pledge:</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, this's a heavy chance 'twixt him and you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Your ancient, trusty, pleasant servant Grumio.</div>
                     <div class="line">And tell me now, sweet friend, what happy gale</div>
                     <div class="line">Blows you to Padua here from old Verona?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Such wind as scatters young men through the world,</div>
                     <div class="line">To seek their fortunes farther than at home</div>
                     <div class="line">Where small experience grows. But in a few,</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Hortensio, thus it stands with me:</div>
                     <div class="line">Antonio, my father, is deceased;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I have thrust myself into this maze,</div>
                     <div class="line">Haply to wive and thrive as best I may:</div>
                     <div class="line">Crowns in my purse I have and goods at home,</div>
                     <div class="line">And so am come abroad to see the world.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio, shall I then come roundly to thee</div>
                     <div class="line">And wish thee to a shrewd ill-favour'd wife?</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou'ldst thank me but a little for my counsel:</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet I'll promise thee she shall be rich</div>
                     <div class="line">And very rich: but thou'rt too much my friend,</div>
                     <div class="line">And I'll not wish thee to her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Hortensio, 'twixt such friends as we</div>
                     <div class="line">Few words suffice; and therefore, if thou know</div>
                     <div class="line">One rich enough to be Petruchio's wife,</div>
                     <div class="line">As wealth is burden of my wooing dance,</div>
                     <div class="line">Be she as foul as was Florentius' love,</div>
                     <div class="line">As old as Sibyl and as curst and shrewd</div>
                     <div class="line">As Socrates' Xanthippe, or a worse,</div>
                     <div class="line">She moves me not, or not removes, at least,</div>
                     <div class="line">Affection's edge in me, were she as rough</div>
                     <div class="line">As are the swelling Adriatic seas:</div>
                     <div class="line">I come to wive it wealthily in Padua;</div>
                     <div class="line">If wealthily, then happily in Padua.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, look you, sir, he tells you flatly what his</div>
                     <div class="line">mind is: Why give him gold enough and marry him to</div>
                     <div class="line">a puppet or an aglet-baby; or an old trot with ne'er</div>
                     <div class="line">a tooth in her head, though she have as many diseases</div>
                     <div class="line">as two and fifty horses: why, nothing comes amiss,</div>
                     <div class="line">so money comes withal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio, since we are stepp'd thus far in,</div>
                     <div class="line">I will continue that I broach'd in jest.</div>
                     <div class="line">I can, Petruchio, help thee to a wife</div>
                     <div class="line">With wealth enough and young and beauteous,</div>
                     <div class="line">Brought up as best becomes a gentlewoman:</div>
                     <div class="line">Her only fault, and that is faults enough,</div>
                     <div class="line">Is that she is intolerable curst</div>
                     <div class="line">And shrewd and froward, so beyond all measure</div>
                     <div class="line">That, were my state far worser than it is,</div>
                     <div class="line">I would not wed her for a mine of gold.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hortensio, peace! thou know'st not gold's effect:</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me her father's name and 'tis enough;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I will board her, though she chide as loud</div>
                     <div class="line">As thunder when the clouds in autumn crack.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Her father is Baptista Minola,</div>
                     <div class="line">An affable and courteous gentleman:</div>
                     <div class="line">Her name is Katharina Minola,</div>
                     <div class="line">Renown'd in Padua for her scolding tongue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I know her father, though I know not her;</div>
                     <div class="line">And he knew my deceased father well.</div>
                     <div class="line">I will not sleep, Hortensio, till I see her;</div>
                     <div class="line">And therefore let me be thus bold with you</div>
                     <div class="line">To give you over at this first encounter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unless you will accompany me thither.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, sir, let him go while the humour lasts.</div>
                     <div class="line">O' my word, an she knew him as well as I do, she</div>
                     <div class="line">would think scolding would do little good upon him:</div>
                     <div class="line">she may perhaps call him half a score knaves or so:</div>
                     <div class="line">why, that's nothing; an he begin once, he'll rail in</div>
                     <div class="line">his rope-tricks. I'll tell you what sir, an she</div>
                     <div class="line">stand him but a little, he will throw a figure in</div>
                     <div class="line">her face and so disfigure her with it that she</div>
                     <div class="line">shall have no more eyes to see withal than a cat.</div>
                     <div class="line">You know him not, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Tarry, Petruchio, I must go with thee,</div>
                     <div class="line">For in Baptista's keep my treasure is:</div>
                     <div class="line">He hath the jewel of my life in hold,</div>
                     <div class="line">His youngest daughter, beautiful Binaca,</div>
                     <div class="line">And her withholds from me and other more,</div>
                     <div class="line">Suitors to her and rivals in my love,</div>
                     <div class="line">Supposing it a thing impossible,</div>
                     <div class="line">For those defects I have before rehearsed,</div>
                     <div class="line">That ever Katharina will be woo'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore this order hath Baptista ta'en,</div>
                     <div class="line">That none shall have access unto Bianca</div>
                     <div class="line">Till Katharina the curst have got a husband.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Katharina the curst!</div>
                     <div class="line">A title for a maid of all titles the worst.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now shall my friend Petruchio do me grace,</div>
                     <div class="line">And offer me disguised in sober robes</div>
                     <div class="line">To old Baptista as a schoolmaster</div>
                     <div class="line">Well seen in music, to instruct Bianca;</div>
                     <div class="line">That so I may, by this device, at least</div>
                     <div class="line">Have leave and leisure to make love to her</div>
                     <div class="line">And unsuspected court her by herself.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's no knavery! See, to beguile the old folks,</div>
                     <div class="line">how the young folks lay their heads together!</div>
                     <p>Enter GREMIO, and LUCENTIO disguised</p>
                     <div class="line">Master, master, look about you: who goes there, ha?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, Grumio! it is the rival of my love.</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio, stand by a while.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A proper stripling and an amorous!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, very well; I have perused the note.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark you, sir: I'll have them very fairly bound:</div>
                     <div class="line">All books of love, see that at any hand;</div>
                     <div class="line">And see you read no other lectures to her:</div>
                     <div class="line">You understand me: over and beside</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Baptista's liberality,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll mend it with a largess. Take your paper too,</div>
                     <div class="line">And let me have them very well perfumed</div>
                     <div class="line">For she is sweeter than perfume itself</div>
                     <div class="line">To whom they go to. What will you read to her?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Whate'er I read to her, I'll plead for you</div>
                     <div class="line">As for my patron, stand you so assured,</div>
                     <div class="line">As firmly as yourself were still in place:</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, and perhaps with more successful words</div>
                     <div class="line">Than you, unless you were a scholar, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O this learning, what a thing it is!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O this woodcock, what an ass it is!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Peace, sirrah!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Grumio, mum! God save you, Signior Gremio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And you are well met, Signior Hortensio.</div>
                     <div class="line">Trow you whither I am going? To Baptista Minola.</div>
                     <div class="line">I promised to inquire carefully</div>
                     <div class="line">About a schoolmaster for the fair Bianca:</div>
                     <div class="line">And by good fortune I have lighted well</div>
                     <div class="line">On this young man, for learning and behavior</div>
                     <div class="line">Fit for her turn, well read in poetry</div>
                     <div class="line">And other books, good ones, I warrant ye.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis well; and I have met a gentleman</div>
                     <div class="line">Hath promised me to help me to another,</div>
                     <div class="line">A fine musician to instruct our mistress;</div>
                     <div class="line">So shall I no whit be behind in duty</div>
                     <div class="line">To fair Bianca, so beloved of me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Beloved of me; and that my deeds shall prove.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And that his bags shall prove.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Gremio, 'tis now no time to vent our love:</div>
                     <div class="line">Listen to me, and if you speak me fair,</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll tell you news indifferent good for either.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is a gentleman whom by chance I met,</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon agreement from us to his liking,</div>
                     <div class="line">Will undertake to woo curst Katharina,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, and to marry her, if her dowry please.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">So said, so done, is well.</div>
                     <div class="line">Hortensio, have you told him all her faults?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I know she is an irksome brawling scold:</div>
                     <div class="line">If that be all, masters, I hear no harm.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, say'st me so, friend? What countryman?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Born in Verona, old Antonio's son:</div>
                     <div class="line">My father dead, my fortune lives for me;</div>
                     <div class="line">And I do hope good days and long to see.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O sir, such a life, with such a wife, were strange!</div>
                     <div class="line">But if you have a stomach, to't i' God's name:</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall have me assisting you in all.</div>
                     <div class="line">But will you woo this wild-cat?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will I live?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Will he woo her? ay, or I'll hang her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why came I hither but to that intent?</div>
                     <div class="line">Think you a little din can daunt mine ears?</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I not in my time heard lions roar?</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I not heard the sea puff'd up with winds</div>
                     <div class="line">Rage like an angry boar chafed with sweat?</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I not heard great ordnance in the field,</div>
                     <div class="line">And heaven's artillery thunder in the skies?</div>
                     <div class="line">Have I not in a pitched battle heard</div>
                     <div class="line">Loud 'larums, neighing steeds, and trumpets' clang?</div>
                     <div class="line">And do you tell me of a woman's tongue,</div>
                     <div class="line">That gives not half so great a blow to hear</div>
                     <div class="line">As will a chestnut in a farmer's fire?</div>
                     <div class="line">Tush, tush! fear boys with bugs.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For he fears none.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hortensio, hark:</div>
                     <div class="line">This gentleman is happily arrived,</div>
                     <div class="line">My mind presumes, for his own good and ours.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I promised we would be contributors</div>
                     <div class="line">And bear his charging of wooing, whatsoe'er.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And so we will, provided that he win her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I would I were as sure of a good dinner.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter TRANIO brave, and BIONDELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Gentlemen, God save you. If I may be bold,</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me, I beseech you, which is the readiest way</div>
                     <div class="line">To the house of Signior Baptista Minola?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">He that has the two fair daughters: is't he you mean?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Even he, Biondello.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hark you, sir; you mean not her to--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Perhaps, him and her, sir: what have you to do?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Not her that chides, sir, at any hand, I pray.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I love no chiders, sir. Biondello, let's away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well begun, Tranio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, a word ere you go;</div>
                     <div class="line">Are you a suitor to the maid you talk of, yea or no?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And if I be, sir, is it any offence?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No; if without more words you will get you hence.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, sir, I pray, are not the streets as free</div>
                     <div class="line">For me as for you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But so is not she.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For what reason, I beseech you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For this reason, if you'll know,</div>
                     <div class="line">That she's the choice love of Signior Gremio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That she's the chosen of Signior Hortensio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Softly, my masters! if you be gentlemen,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do me this right; hear me with patience.</div>
                     <div class="line">Baptista is a noble gentleman,</div>
                     <div class="line">To whom my father is not all unknown;</div>
                     <div class="line">And were his daughter fairer than she is,</div>
                     <div class="line">She may more suitors have and me for one.</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair Leda's daughter had a thousand wooers;</div>
                     <div class="line">Then well one more may fair Bianca have:</div>
                     <div class="line">And so she shall; Lucentio shall make one,</div>
                     <div class="line">Though Paris came in hope to speed alone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What! this gentleman will out-talk us all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, give him head: I know he'll prove a jade.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hortensio, to what end are all these words?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, let me be so bold as ask you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Did you yet ever see Baptista's daughter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">No, sir; but hear I do that he hath two,</div>
                     <div class="line">The one as famous for a scolding tongue</div>
                     <div class="line">As is the other for beauteous modesty.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, sir, the first's for me; let her go by.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, leave that labour to great Hercules;</div>
                     <div class="line">And let it be more than Alcides' twelve.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, understand you this of me in sooth:</div>
                     <div class="line">The youngest daughter whom you hearken for</div>
                     <div class="line">Her father keeps from all access of suitors,</div>
                     <div class="line">And will not promise her to any man</div>
                     <div class="line">Until the elder sister first be wed:</div>
                     <div class="line">The younger then is free and not before.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">If it be so, sir, that you are the man</div>
                     <div class="line">Must stead us all and me amongst the rest,</div>
                     <div class="line">And if you break the ice and do this feat,</div>
                     <div class="line">Achieve the elder, set the younger free</div>
                     <div class="line">For our access, whose hap shall be to have her</div>
                     <div class="line">Will not so graceless be to be ingrate.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, you say well and well you do conceive;</div>
                     <div class="line">And since you do profess to be a suitor,</div>
                     <div class="line">You must, as we do, gratify this gentleman,</div>
                     <div class="line">To whom we all rest generally beholding.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, I shall not be slack: in sign whereof,</div>
                     <div class="line">Please ye we may contrive this afternoon,</div>
                     <div class="line">And quaff carouses to our mistress' health,</div>
                     <div class="line">And do as adversaries do in law,</div>
                     <div class="line">Strive mightily, but eat and drink as friends.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O excellent motion! Fellows, let's be gone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The motion's good indeed and be it so,</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio, I shall be your ben venuto.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.5">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 3. ACT II</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.5.2">1. SCENE I.  Padua. A room in BAPTISTA'S house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.5.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Padua. A room in BAPTISTA'S house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter KATHARINA and BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good sister, wrong me not, nor wrong yourself,</div>
                     <div class="line">To make a bondmaid and a slave of me;</div>
                     <div class="line">That I disdain: but for these other gawds,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unbind my hands, I'll pull them off myself,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yea, all my raiment, to my petticoat;</div>
                     <div class="line">Or what you will command me will I do,</div>
                     <div class="line">So well I know my duty to my elders.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Of all thy suitors, here I charge thee, tell</div>
                     <div class="line">Whom thou lovest best: see thou dissemble not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Believe me, sister, of all the men alive</div>
                     <div class="line">I never yet beheld that special face</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I could fancy more than any other.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Minion, thou liest. Is't not Hortensio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">If you affect him, sister, here I swear</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll plead for you myself, but you shall have</div>
                     <div class="line">him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">O then, belike, you fancy riches more:</div>
                     <div class="line">You will have Gremio to keep you fair.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Is it for him you do envy me so?</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay then you jest, and now I well perceive</div>
                     <div class="line">You have but jested with me all this while:</div>
                     <div class="line">I prithee, sister Kate, untie my hands.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">If that be jest, then all the rest was so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Strikes her</p>
               <p>Enter BAPTISTA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how now, dame! whence grows this insolence?</div>
                     <div class="line">Bianca, stand aside. Poor girl! she weeps.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go ply thy needle; meddle not with her.</div>
                     <div class="line">For shame, thou helding of a devilish spirit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Why dost thou wrong her that did ne'er wrong thee?</div>
                     <div class="line">When did she cross thee with a bitter word?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Her silence flouts me, and I'll be revenged.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Flies after BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, in my sight? Bianca, get thee in.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, will you not suffer me? Nay, now I see</div>
                     <div class="line">She is your treasure, she must have a husband;</div>
                     <div class="line">I must dance bare-foot on her wedding day</div>
                     <div class="line">And for your love to her lead apes in hell.</div>
                     <div class="line">Talk not to me: I will go sit and weep</div>
                     <div class="line">Till I can find occasion of revenge.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Was ever gentleman thus grieved as I?</div>
                     <div class="line">But who comes here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter GREMIO, LUCENTIO in the habit of a mean man;
PETRUCHIO, with HORTENSIO as a musician; and TRANIO,
with BIONDELLO bearing a lute and books</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Good morrow, neighbour Baptista.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Good morrow, neighbour Gremio.</div>
                     <div class="line">God save you, gentlemen!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And you, good sir! Pray, have you not a daughter</div>
                     <div class="line">Call'd Katharina, fair and virtuous?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">I have a daughter, sir, called Katharina.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You are too blunt: go to it orderly.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You wrong me, Signior Gremio: give me leave.</div>
                     <div class="line">I am a gentleman of Verona, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, hearing of her beauty and her wit,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her affability and bashful modesty,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her wondrous qualities and mild behavior,</div>
                     <div class="line">Am bold to show myself a forward guest</div>
                     <div class="line">Within your house, to make mine eye the witness</div>
                     <div class="line">Of that report which I so oft have heard.</div>
                     <div class="line">And, for an entrance to my entertainment,</div>
                     <div class="line">I do present you with a man of mine,</div>
                     <p>Presenting HORTENSIO</p>
                     <div class="line">Cunning in music and the mathematics,</div>
                     <div class="line">To instruct her fully in those sciences,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whereof I know she is not ignorant:</div>
                     <div class="line">Accept of him, or else you do me wrong:</div>
                     <div class="line">His name is Licio, born in Mantua.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">You're welcome, sir; and he, for your good sake.</div>
                     <div class="line">But for my daughter Katharina, this I know,</div>
                     <div class="line">She is not for your turn, the more my grief.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I see you do not mean to part with her,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or else you like not of my company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistake me not; I speak but as I find.</div>
                     <div class="line">Whence are you, sir? what may I call your name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio is my name; Antonio's son,</div>
                     <div class="line">A man well known throughout all Italy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">I know him well: you are welcome for his sake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Saving your tale, Petruchio, I pray,</div>
                     <div class="line">Let us, that are poor petitioners, speak too:</div>
                     <div class="line">Baccare! you are marvellous forward.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, pardon me, Signior Gremio; I would fain be doing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I doubt it not, sir; but you will curse your</div>
                     <div class="line">wooing. Neighbour, this is a gift very grateful, I am</div>
                     <div class="line">sure of it. To express the like kindness, myself,</div>
                     <div class="line">that have been more kindly beholding to you than</div>
                     <div class="line">any, freely give unto you this young scholar,</div>
                     <p>Presenting LUCENTIO</p>
                     <div class="line">that hath been long studying at Rheims; as cunning</div>
                     <div class="line">in Greek, Latin, and other languages, as the other</div>
                     <div class="line">in music and mathematics: his name is Cambio; pray,</div>
                     <div class="line">accept his service.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">A thousand thanks, Signior Gremio.</div>
                     <div class="line">Welcome, good Cambio.</div>
                     <p>To TRANIO</p>
                     <div class="line">But, gentle sir, methinks you walk like a stranger:</div>
                     <div class="line">may I be so bold to know the cause of your coming?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon me, sir, the boldness is mine own,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, being a stranger in this city here,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do make myself a suitor to your daughter,</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto Bianca, fair and virtuous.</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor is your firm resolve unknown to me,</div>
                     <div class="line">In the preferment of the eldest sister.</div>
                     <div class="line">This liberty is all that I request,</div>
                     <div class="line">That, upon knowledge of my parentage,</div>
                     <div class="line">I may have welcome 'mongst the rest that woo</div>
                     <div class="line">And free access and favour as the rest:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, toward the education of your daughters,</div>
                     <div class="line">I here bestow a simple instrument,</div>
                     <div class="line">And this small packet of Greek and Latin books:</div>
                     <div class="line">If you accept them, then their worth is great.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Lucentio is your name; of whence, I pray?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Of Pisa, sir; son to Vincentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">A mighty man of Pisa; by report</div>
                     <div class="line">I know him well: you are very welcome, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">Take you the lute, and you the set of books;</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall go see your pupils presently.</div>
                     <div class="line">Holla, within!</div>
                     <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah, lead these gentlemen</div>
                     <div class="line">To my daughters; and tell them both,</div>
                     <div class="line">These are their tutors: bid them use them well.</div>
                     <p>Exit Servant, with LUCENTIO and HORTENSIO,
BIONDELLO following</p>
                     <div class="line">We will go walk a little in the orchard,</div>
                     <div class="line">And then to dinner. You are passing welcome,</div>
                     <div class="line">And so I pray you all to think yourselves.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Baptista, my business asketh haste,</div>
                     <div class="line">And every day I cannot come to woo.</div>
                     <div class="line">You knew my father well, and in him me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Left solely heir to all his lands and goods,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which I have better'd rather than decreased:</div>
                     <div class="line">Then tell me, if I get your daughter's love,</div>
                     <div class="line">What dowry shall I have with her to wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">After my death the one half of my lands,</div>
                     <div class="line">And in possession twenty thousand crowns.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And, for that dowry, I'll assure her of</div>
                     <div class="line">Her widowhood, be it that she survive me,</div>
                     <div class="line">In all my lands and leases whatsoever:</div>
                     <div class="line">Let specialties be therefore drawn between us,</div>
                     <div class="line">That covenants may be kept on either hand.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, when the special thing is well obtain'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">That is, her love; for that is all in all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, that is nothing: for I tell you, father,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am as peremptory as she proud-minded;</div>
                     <div class="line">And where two raging fires meet together</div>
                     <div class="line">They do consume the thing that feeds their fury:</div>
                     <div class="line">Though little fire grows great with little wind,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet extreme gusts will blow out fire and all:</div>
                     <div class="line">So I to her and so she yields to me;</div>
                     <div class="line">For I am rough and woo not like a babe.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well mayst thou woo, and happy be thy speed!</div>
                     <div class="line">But be thou arm'd for some unhappy words.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, to the proof; as mountains are for winds,</div>
                     <div class="line">That shake not, though they blow perpetually.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter HORTENSIO, with his head broke</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">How now, my friend! why dost thou look so pale?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For fear, I promise you, if I look pale.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, will my daughter prove a good musician?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I think she'll sooner prove a soldier</div>
                     <div class="line">Iron may hold with her, but never lutes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then thou canst not break her to the lute?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, no; for she hath broke the lute to me.</div>
                     <div class="line">I did but tell her she mistook her frets,</div>
                     <div class="line">And bow'd her hand to teach her fingering;</div>
                     <div class="line">When, with a most impatient devilish spirit,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Frets, call you these?' quoth she; 'I'll fume</div>
                     <div class="line">with them:'</div>
                     <div class="line">And, with that word, she struck me on the head,</div>
                     <div class="line">And through the instrument my pate made way;</div>
                     <div class="line">And there I stood amazed for a while,</div>
                     <div class="line">As on a pillory, looking through the lute;</div>
                     <div class="line">While she did call me rascal fiddler</div>
                     <div class="line">And twangling Jack; with twenty such vile terms,</div>
                     <div class="line">As had she studied to misuse me so.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, by the world, it is a lusty wench;</div>
                     <div class="line">I love her ten times more than e'er I did:</div>
                     <div class="line">O, how I long to have some chat with her!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, go with me and be not so discomfited:</div>
                     <div class="line">Proceed in practise with my younger daughter;</div>
                     <div class="line">She's apt to learn and thankful for good turns.</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Petruchio, will you go with us,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or shall I send my daughter Kate to you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you do.</div>
                     <p>Exeunt all but PETRUCHIO</p>
                     <div class="line">I will attend her here,</div>
                     <div class="line">And woo her with some spirit when she comes.</div>
                     <div class="line">Say that she rail; why then I'll tell her plain</div>
                     <div class="line">She sings as sweetly as a nightingale:</div>
                     <div class="line">Say that she frown, I'll say she looks as clear</div>
                     <div class="line">As morning roses newly wash'd with dew:</div>
                     <div class="line">Say she be mute and will not speak a word;</div>
                     <div class="line">Then I'll commend her volubility,</div>
                     <div class="line">And say she uttereth piercing eloquence:</div>
                     <div class="line">If she do bid me pack, I'll give her thanks,</div>
                     <div class="line">As though she bid me stay by her a week:</div>
                     <div class="line">If she deny to wed, I'll crave the day</div>
                     <div class="line">When I shall ask the banns and when be married.</div>
                     <div class="line">But here she comes; and now, Petruchio, speak.</div>
                     <p>Enter KATHARINA</p>
                     <div class="line">Good morrow, Kate; for that's your name, I hear.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well have you heard, but something hard of hearing:</div>
                     <div class="line">They call me Katharina that do talk of me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You lie, in faith; for you are call'd plain Kate,</div>
                     <div class="line">And bonny Kate and sometimes Kate the curst;</div>
                     <div class="line">But Kate, the prettiest Kate in Christendom</div>
                     <div class="line">Kate of Kate Hall, my super-dainty Kate,</div>
                     <div class="line">For dainties are all Kates, and therefore, Kate,</div>
                     <div class="line">Take this of me, Kate of my consolation;</div>
                     <div class="line">Hearing thy mildness praised in every town,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy virtues spoke of, and thy beauty sounded,</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet not so deeply as to thee belongs,</div>
                     <div class="line">Myself am moved to woo thee for my wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Moved! in good time: let him that moved you hither</div>
                     <div class="line">Remove you hence: I knew you at the first</div>
                     <div class="line">You were a moveable.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, what's a moveable?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">A join'd-stool.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou hast hit it: come, sit on me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Asses are made to bear, and so are you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Women are made to bear, and so are you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">No such jade as you, if me you mean.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Alas! good Kate, I will not burden thee;</div>
                     <div class="line">For, knowing thee to be but young and light--</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Too light for such a swain as you to catch;</div>
                     <div class="line">And yet as heavy as my weight should be.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Should be! should--buzz!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well ta'en, and like a buzzard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O slow-wing'd turtle! shall a buzzard take thee?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, for a turtle, as he takes a buzzard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, come, you wasp; i' faith, you are too angry.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">If I be waspish, best beware my sting.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My remedy is then, to pluck it out.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, if the fool could find it where it lies,</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who knows not where a wasp does</div>
                     <div class="line">wear his sting? In his tail.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">In his tongue.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Whose tongue?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yours, if you talk of tails: and so farewell.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, with my tongue in your tail? nay, come again,</div>
                     <div class="line">Good Kate; I am a gentleman.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">That I'll try.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>She strikes him</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I swear I'll cuff you, if you strike again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">So may you lose your arms:</div>
                     <div class="line">If you strike me, you are no gentleman;</div>
                     <div class="line">And if no gentleman, why then no arms.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A herald, Kate? O, put me in thy books!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">What is your crest? a coxcomb?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A combless cock, so Kate will be my hen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">No cock of mine; you crow too like a craven.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, come, Kate, come; you must not look so sour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">It is my fashion, when I see a crab.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, here's no crab; and therefore look not sour.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">There is, there is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then show it me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Had I a glass, I would.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, you mean my face?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Well aim'd of such a young one.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, by Saint George, I am too young for you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Yet you are wither'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis with cares.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">I care not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
