                        <span>Aside</span>  Why, so this gallant will command the sun.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter TRANIO, and the Pedant dressed like VINCENTIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, this is the house: please it you that I call?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, what else? and but I be deceived</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Baptista may remember me,</div>
                     <div class="line">Near twenty years ago, in Genoa,</div>
                     <div class="line">Where we were lodgers at the Pegasus.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis well; and hold your own, in any case,</div>
                     <div class="line">With such austerity as 'longeth to a father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">I warrant you.</div>
                     <p>Enter BIONDELLO</p>
                     <div class="line">But, sir, here comes your boy;</div>
                     <div class="line">'Twere good he were school'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear you not him. Sirrah Biondello,</div>
                     <div class="line">Now do your duty throughly, I advise you:</div>
                     <div class="line">Imagine 'twere the right Vincentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Tut, fear not me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But hast thou done thy errand to Baptista?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I told him that your father was at Venice,</div>
                     <div class="line">And that you look'd for him this day in Padua.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou'rt a tall fellow: hold thee that to drink.</div>
                     <div class="line">Here comes Baptista: set your countenance, sir.</div>
                     <p>Enter BAPTISTA and LUCENTIO</p>
                     <div class="line">Signior Baptista, you are happily met.</div>
                     <p>To the Pedant</p>
                     <div class="line">Sir, this is the gentleman I told you of:</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you stand good father to me now,</div>
                     <div class="line">Give me Bianca for my patrimony.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Soft son!</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, by your leave: having come to Padua</div>
                     <div class="line">To gather in some debts, my son Lucentio</div>
                     <div class="line">Made me acquainted with a weighty cause</div>
                     <div class="line">Of love between your daughter and himself:</div>
                     <div class="line">And, for the good report I hear of you</div>
                     <div class="line">And for the love he beareth to your daughter</div>
                     <div class="line">And she to him, to stay him not too long,</div>
                     <div class="line">I am content, in a good father's care,</div>
                     <div class="line">To have him match'd; and if you please to like</div>
                     <div class="line">No worse than I, upon some agreement</div>
                     <div class="line">Me shall you find ready and willing</div>
                     <div class="line">With one consent to have her so bestow'd;</div>
                     <div class="line">For curious I cannot be with you,</div>
                     <div class="line">Signior Baptista, of whom I hear so well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, pardon me in what I have to say:</div>
                     <div class="line">Your plainness and your shortness please me well.</div>
                     <div class="line">Right true it is, your son Lucentio here</div>
                     <div class="line">Doth love my daughter and she loveth him,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or both dissemble deeply their affections:</div>
                     <div class="line">And therefore, if you say no more than this,</div>
                     <div class="line">That like a father you will deal with him</div>
                     <div class="line">And pass my daughter a sufficient dower,</div>
                     <div class="line">The match is made, and all is done:</div>
                     <div class="line">Your son shall have my daughter with consent.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank you, sir. Where then do you know best</div>
                     <div class="line">We be affied and such assurance ta'en</div>
                     <div class="line">As shall with either part's agreement stand?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Not in my house, Lucentio; for, you know,</div>
                     <div class="line">Pitchers have ears, and I have many servants:</div>
                     <div class="line">Besides, old Gremio is hearkening still;</div>
                     <div class="line">And happily we might be interrupted.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then at my lodging, an it like you:</div>
                     <div class="line">There doth my father lie; and there, this night,</div>
                     <div class="line">We'll pass the business privately and well.</div>
                     <div class="line">Send for your daughter by your servant here:</div>
                     <div class="line">My boy shall fetch the scrivener presently.</div>
                     <div class="line">The worst is this, that, at so slender warning,</div>
                     <div class="line">You are like to have a thin and slender pittance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">It likes me well. Biondello, hie you home,</div>
                     <div class="line">And bid Bianca make her ready straight;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, if you will, tell what hath happened,</div>
                     <div class="line">Lucentio's father is arrived in Padua,</div>
                     <div class="line">And how she's like to be Lucentio's wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray the gods she may with all my heart!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Dally not with the gods, but get thee gone.</div>
                     <p>Exit BIONDELLO</p>
                     <div class="line">Signior Baptista, shall I lead the way?</div>
                     <div class="line">Welcome! one mess is like to be your cheer:</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, sir; we will better it in Pisa.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">I follow you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt TRANIO, Pedant, and BAPTISTA</p>
               <p>Re-enter BIONDELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Cambio!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What sayest thou, Biondello?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">You saw my master wink and laugh upon you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Biondello, what of that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Faith, nothing; but has left me here behind, to</div>
                     <div class="line">expound the meaning or moral of his signs and tokens.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray thee, moralize them.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then thus. Baptista is safe, talking with the</div>
                     <div class="line">deceiving father of a deceitful son.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And what of him?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">His daughter is to be brought by you to the supper.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And then?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">The old priest of Saint Luke's church is at your</div>
                     <div class="line">command at all hours.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And what of all this?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot tell; expect they are busied about a</div>
                     <div class="line">counterfeit assurance: take you assurance of her,</div>
                     <div class="line">'cum privilegio ad imprimendum solum:' to the</div>
                     <div class="line">church; take the priest, clerk, and some sufficient</div>
                     <div class="line">honest witnesses: If this be not that you look for,</div>
                     <div class="line">I have no more to say, But bid Bianca farewell for</div>
                     <div class="line">ever and a day.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hearest thou, Biondello?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I cannot tarry: I knew a wench married in an</div>
                     <div class="line">afternoon as she went to the garden for parsley to</div>
                     <div class="line">stuff a rabbit; and so may you, sir: and so, adieu,</div>
                     <div class="line">sir. My master hath appointed me to go to Saint</div>
                     <div class="line">Luke's, to bid the priest be ready to come against</div>
                     <div class="line">you come with your appendix.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I may, and will, if she be so contented:</div>
                     <div class="line">She will be pleased; then wherefore should I doubt?</div>
                     <div class="line">Hap what hap may, I'll roundly go about her:</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall go hard if Cambio go without her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.7.6">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>5. SCENE V.  A public road.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, HORTENSIO, and Servants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come on, i' God's name; once more toward our father's.</div>
                     <div class="line">Good Lord, how bright and goodly shines the moon!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">The moon! the sun: it is not moonlight now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I say it is the moon that shines so bright.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">I know it is the sun that shines so bright.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, by my mother's son, and that's myself,</div>
                     <div class="line">It shall be moon, or star, or what I list,</div>
                     <div class="line">Or ere I journey to your father's house.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go on, and fetch our horses back again.</div>
                     <div class="line">Evermore cross'd and cross'd; nothing but cross'd!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Say as he says, or we shall never go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Forward, I pray, since we have come so far,</div>
                     <div class="line">And be it moon, or sun, or what you please:</div>
                     <div class="line">An if you please to call it a rush-candle,</div>
                     <div class="line">Henceforth I vow it shall be so for me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I say it is the moon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">I know it is the moon.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, then you lie: it is the blessed sun.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Then, God be bless'd, it is the blessed sun:</div>
                     <div class="line">But sun it is not, when you say it is not;</div>
                     <div class="line">And the moon changes even as your mind.</div>
                     <div class="line">What you will have it named, even that it is;</div>
                     <div class="line">And so it shall be so for Katharina.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Petruchio, go thy ways; the field is won.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, forward, forward! thus the bowl should run,</div>
                     <div class="line">And not unluckily against the bias.</div>
                     <div class="line">But, soft! company is coming here.</div>
                     <p>Enter VINCENTIO</p>
                     <p>To VINCENTIO</p>
                     <div class="line">Good morrow, gentle mistress: where away?</div>
                     <div class="line">Tell me, sweet Kate, and tell me truly too,</div>
                     <div class="line">Hast thou beheld a fresher gentlewoman?</div>
                     <div class="line">Such war of white and red within her cheeks!</div>
                     <div class="line">What stars do spangle heaven with such beauty,</div>
                     <div class="line">As those two eyes become that heavenly face?</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair lovely maid, once more good day to thee.</div>
                     <div class="line">Sweet Kate, embrace her for her beauty's sake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A' will make the man mad, to make a woman of him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Young budding virgin, fair and fresh and sweet,</div>
                     <div class="line">Whither away, or where is thy abode?</div>
                     <div class="line">Happy the parents of so fair a child;</div>
                     <div class="line">Happier the man, whom favourable stars</div>
                     <div class="line">Allot thee for his lovely bed-fellow!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, how now, Kate! I hope thou art not mad:</div>
                     <div class="line">This is a man, old, wrinkled, faded, wither'd,</div>
                     <div class="line">And not a maiden, as thou say'st he is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon, old father, my mistaking eyes,</div>
                     <div class="line">That have been so bedazzled with the sun</div>
                     <div class="line">That everything I look on seemeth green:</div>
                     <div class="line">Now I perceive thou art a reverend father;</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon, I pray thee, for my mad mistaking.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Do, good old grandsire; and withal make known</div>
                     <div class="line">Which way thou travellest: if along with us,</div>
                     <div class="line">We shall be joyful of thy company.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fair sir, and you my merry mistress,</div>
                     <div class="line">That with your strange encounter much amazed me,</div>
                     <div class="line">My name is call'd Vincentio; my dwelling Pisa;</div>
                     <div class="line">And bound I am to Padua; there to visit</div>
                     <div class="line">A son of mine, which long I have not seen.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What is his name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lucentio, gentle sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Happily we met; the happier for thy son.</div>
                     <div class="line">And now by law, as well as reverend age,</div>
                     <div class="line">I may entitle thee my loving father:</div>
                     <div class="line">The sister to my wife, this gentlewoman,</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy son by this hath married. Wonder not,</div>
                     <div class="line">Nor be grieved: she is of good esteem,</div>
                     <div class="line">Her dowery wealthy, and of worthy birth;</div>
                     <div class="line">Beside, so qualified as may beseem</div>
                     <div class="line">The spouse of any noble gentleman.</div>
                     <div class="line">Let me embrace with old Vincentio,</div>
                     <div class="line">And wander we to see thy honest son,</div>
                     <div class="line">Who will of thy arrival be full joyous.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">But is it true? or else is it your pleasure,</div>
                     <div class="line">Like pleasant travellers, to break a jest</div>
                     <div class="line">Upon the company you overtake?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I do assure thee, father, so it is.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come, go along, and see the truth hereof;</div>
                     <div class="line">For our first merriment hath made thee jealous.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt all but HORTENSIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, Petruchio, this has put me in heart.</div>
                     <div class="line">Have to my widow! and if she be froward,</div>
                     <div class="line">Then hast thou taught Hortensio to be untoward.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
            </section>
         </article>
         <article class="chapter" id="R.1.8">
            <header class="chapter-titlepage">
               <h2>Chapter 6. ACT V</h2>
            </header>
            <div class="lists-of-titles">
               <div class="toc">
                  <p>
                     <b>Table of Contents</b>
                  </p>
                  <ul class="toc">
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.2">1. SCENE I.  Padua. Before LUCENTIO'S house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                     <li>
                        <span>
                           <a href="#R.1.8.3">2. SCENE II.  Padua. LUCENTIO'S house.</a>
                        </span>
                     </li>
                  </ul>
               </div>
            </div>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.8.2">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>1. SCENE I.  Padua. Before LUCENTIO'S house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>GREMIO discovered. Enter behind BIONDELLO,
LUCENTIO, and BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Softly and swiftly, sir; for the priest is ready.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I fly, Biondello: but they may chance to need thee</div>
                     <div class="line">at home; therefore leave us.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, faith, I'll see the church o' your back; and</div>
                     <div class="line">then come back to my master's as soon as I can.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt LUCENTIO, BIANCA, and BIONDELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I marvel Cambio comes not all this while.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Enter PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, VINCENTIO, GRUMIO,
with Attendants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, here's the door, this is Lucentio's house:</div>
                     <div class="line">My father's bears more toward the market-place;</div>
                     <div class="line">Thither must I, and here I leave you, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You shall not choose but drink before you go:</div>
                     <div class="line">I think I shall command your welcome here,</div>
                     <div class="line">And, by all likelihood, some cheer is toward.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Knocks</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">They're busy within; you were best knock louder.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Pedant looks out of the window</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">What's he that knocks as he would beat down the gate?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is Signior Lucentio within, sir?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">He's within, sir, but not to be spoken withal.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What if a man bring him a hundred pound or two, to</div>
                     <div class="line">make merry withal?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Keep your hundred pounds to yourself: he shall</div>
                     <div class="line">need none, so long as I live.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, I told you your son was well beloved in Padua.</div>
                     <div class="line">Do you hear, sir? To leave frivolous circumstances,</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, tell Signior Lucentio that his father is</div>
                     <div class="line">come from Pisa, and is here at the door to speak with him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Thou liest: his father is come from Padua and here</div>
                     <div class="line">looking out at the window.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Art thou his father?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, sir; so his mother says, if I may believe her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>To VINCENTIO</span>  Why, how now, gentleman! why, this</div>
                     <div class="line">is flat knavery, to take upon you another man's name.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Lay hands on the villain: I believe a' means to</div>
                     <div class="line">cozen somebody in this city under my countenance.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter BIONDELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I have seen them in the church together: God send</div>
                     <div class="line">'em good shipping! But who is here? mine old</div>
                     <div class="line">master Vincentio! now we are undone and brought to nothing.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Seeing BIONDELLO</span>
                     </div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, crack-hemp.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Hope I may choose, sir.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Come hither, you rogue. What, have you forgot me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Forgot you! no, sir: I could not forget you, for I</div>
                     <div class="line">never saw you before in all my life.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, you notorious villain, didst thou never see</div>
                     <div class="line">thy master's father, Vincentio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, my old worshipful old master? yes, marry, sir:</div>
                     <div class="line">see where he looks out of the window.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is't so, indeed.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Beats BIONDELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Help, help, help! here's a madman will murder me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Help, son! help, Signior Baptista!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit from above</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Prithee, Kate, let's stand aside and see the end of</div>
                     <div class="line">this controversy.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>They retire</p>
               <p>Re-enter Pedant below; TRANIO, BAPTISTA, and Servants</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, what are you that offer to beat my servant?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What am I, sir! nay, what are you, sir? O immortal</div>
                     <div class="line">gods! O fine villain! A silken doublet! a velvet</div>
                     <div class="line">hose! a scarlet cloak! and a copatain hat! O, I</div>
                     <div class="line">am undone! I am undone! while I play the good</div>
                     <div class="line">husband at home, my son and my servant spend all at</div>
                     <div class="line">the university.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How now! what's the matter?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, is the man lunatic?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, you seem a sober ancient gentleman by your</div>
                     <div class="line">habit, but your words show you a madman. Why, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">what 'cerns it you if I wear pearl and gold? I</div>
                     <div class="line">thank my good father, I am able to maintain it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thy father! O villain! he is a sailmaker in Bergamo.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">You mistake, sir, you mistake, sir. Pray, what do</div>
                     <div class="line">you think is his name?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">His name! as if I knew not his name: I have brought</div>
                     <div class="line">him up ever since he was three years old, and his</div>
                     <div class="line">name is Tranio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, away, mad ass! his name is Lucentio and he is</div>
                     <div class="line">mine only son, and heir to the lands of me, Signior Vincentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lucentio! O, he hath murdered his master! Lay hold</div>
                     <div class="line">on him, I charge you, in the duke's name. O, my</div>
                     <div class="line">son, my son! Tell me, thou villain, where is my son Lucentio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Call forth an officer.</div>
                     <p>Enter one with an Officer</p>
                     <div class="line">Carry this mad knave to the gaol. Father Baptista,</div>
                     <div class="line">I charge you see that he be forthcoming.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Carry me to the gaol!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Stay, officer: he shall not go to prison.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Talk not, Signior Gremio: I say he shall go to prison.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Take heed, Signior Baptista, lest you be</div>
                     <div class="line">cony-catched in this business: I dare swear this</div>
                     <div class="line">is the right Vincentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                     <div class="line">Swear, if thou darest.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, I dare not swear it.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Then thou wert best say that I am not Lucentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Yes, I know thee to be Signior Lucentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Away with the dotard! to the gaol with him!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus strangers may be hailed and abused: O</div>
                     <div class="line">monstrous villain!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter BIONDELLO, with LUCENTIO and BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">O! we are spoiled and--yonder he is: deny him,</div>
                     <div class="line">forswear him, or else we are all undone.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">
                        <span>Kneeling</span>  Pardon, sweet father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Lives my sweet son?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt BIONDELLO, TRANIO, and Pedant, as fast
as may be</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Pardon, dear father.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">How hast thou offended?</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is Lucentio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's Lucentio,</div>
                     <div class="line">Right son to the right Vincentio;</div>
                     <div class="line">That have by marriage made thy daughter mine,</div>
                     <div class="line">While counterfeit supposes bleared thine eyne.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here's packing, with a witness to deceive us all!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is that damned villain Tranio,</div>
                     <div class="line">That faced and braved me in this matter so?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, tell me, is not this my Cambio?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Cambio is changed into Lucentio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Love wrought these miracles. Bianca's love</div>
                     <div class="line">Made me exchange my state with Tranio,</div>
                     <div class="line">While he did bear my countenance in the town;</div>
                     <div class="line">And happily I have arrived at the last</div>
                     <div class="line">Unto the wished haven of my bliss.</div>
                     <div class="line">What Tranio did, myself enforced him to;</div>
                     <div class="line">Then pardon him, sweet father, for my sake.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll slit the villain's nose, that would have sent</div>
                     <div class="line">me to the gaol.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">But do you hear, sir? have you married my daughter</div>
                     <div class="line">without asking my good will?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Fear not, Baptista; we will content you, go to: but</div>
                     <div class="line">I will in, to be revenged for this villany.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">And I, to sound the depth of this knavery.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Look not pale, Bianca; thy father will not frown.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt LUCENTIO and BIANCA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My cake is dough; but I'll in among the rest,</div>
                     <div class="line">Out of hope of all, but my share of the feast.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Husband, let's follow, to see the end of this ado.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">First kiss me, Kate, and we will.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">What, in the midst of the street?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What, art thou ashamed of me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">No, sir, God forbid; but ashamed to kiss.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Why, then let's home again. Come, sirrah, let's away.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, I will give thee a kiss: now pray thee, love, stay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Is not this well? Come, my sweet Kate:</div>
                     <div class="line">Better once than never, for never too late.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt</p>
            </section>
            <section class="section" id="R.1.8.3">
               <div class="section-titlepage">
                  <h2>2. SCENE II.  Padua. LUCENTIO'S house.</h2>
               </div>
               <p>Enter BAPTISTA, VINCENTIO, GREMIO, the Pedant,
LUCENTIO, BIANCA, PETRUCHIO, KATHARINA, HORTENSIO,
and Widow, TRANIO, BIONDELLO, and GRUMIO the
Serving-men with Tranio bringing in a banquet</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">At last, though long, our jarring notes agree:</div>
                     <div class="line">And time it is, when raging war is done,</div>
                     <div class="line">To smile at scapes and perils overblown.</div>
                     <div class="line">My fair Bianca, bid my father welcome,</div>
                     <div class="line">While I with self-same kindness welcome thine.</div>
                     <div class="line">Brother Petruchio, sister Katharina,</div>
                     <div class="line">And thou, Hortensio, with thy loving widow,</div>
                     <div class="line">Feast with the best, and welcome to my house:</div>
                     <div class="line">My banquet is to close our stomachs up,</div>
                     <div class="line">After our great good cheer. Pray you, sit down;</div>
                     <div class="line">For now we sit to chat as well as eat.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nothing but sit and sit, and eat and eat!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Padua affords this kindness, son Petruchio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Padua affords nothing but what is kind.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">For both our sakes, I would that word were true.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, for my life, Hortensio fears his widow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                     <div class="line">Then never trust me, if I be afeard.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">You are very sensible, and yet you miss my sense:</div>
                     <div class="line">I mean, Hortensio is afeard of you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                     <div class="line">He that is giddy thinks the world turns round.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Roundly replied.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">Mistress, how mean you that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                     <div class="line">Thus I conceive by him.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Conceives by me! How likes Hortensio that?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">My widow says, thus she conceives her tale.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Very well mended. Kiss him for that, good widow.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">'He that is giddy thinks the world turns round:'</div>
                     <div class="line">I pray you, tell me what you meant by that.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                     <div class="line">Your husband, being troubled with a shrew,</div>
                     <div class="line">Measures my husband's sorrow by his woe:</div>
                     <div class="line">And now you know my meaning,</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">A very mean meaning.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">Widow</div>
                     <div class="line">Right, I mean you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">And I am mean indeed, respecting you.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">To her, Kate!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">To her, widow!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A hundred marks, my Kate does put her down.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That's my office.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Spoke like an officer; ha' to thee, lad!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Drinks to HORTENSIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">How likes Gremio these quick-witted folks?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Believe me, sir, they butt together well.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Head, and butt! an hasty-witted body</div>
                     <div class="line">Would say your head and butt were head and horn.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">VINCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, mistress bride, hath that awaken'd you?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, but not frighted me; therefore I'll sleep again.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, that you shall not: since you have begun,</div>
                     <div class="line">Have at you for a bitter jest or two!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                     <div class="line">Am I your bird? I mean to shift my bush;</div>
                     <div class="line">And then pursue me as you draw your bow.</div>
                     <div class="line">You are welcome all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exeunt BIANCA, KATHARINA, and Widow</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">She hath prevented me. Here, Signior Tranio.</div>
                     <div class="line">This bird you aim'd at, though you hit her not;</div>
                     <div class="line">Therefore a health to all that shot and miss'd.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, sir, Lucentio slipp'd me like his greyhound,</div>
                     <div class="line">Which runs himself and catches for his master.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A good swift simile, but something currish.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis well, sir, that you hunted for yourself:</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis thought your deer does hold you at a bay.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">O ho, Petruchio! Tranio hits you now.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I thank thee for that gird, good Tranio.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Confess, confess, hath he not hit you here?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A' has a little gall'd me, I confess;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, as the jest did glance away from me,</div>
                     <div class="line">'Tis ten to one it maim'd you two outright.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, in good sadness, son Petruchio,</div>
                     <div class="line">I think thou hast the veriest shrew of all.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Well, I say no: and therefore for assurance</div>
                     <div class="line">Let's each one send unto his wife;</div>
                     <div class="line">And he whose wife is most obedient</div>
                     <div class="line">To come at first when he doth send for her,</div>
                     <div class="line">Shall win the wager which we will propose.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Content. What is the wager?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Twenty crowns.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Twenty crowns!</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll venture so much of my hawk or hound,</div>
                     <div class="line">But twenty times so much upon my wife.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A hundred then.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Content.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">A match! 'tis done.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Who shall begin?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">That will I.</div>
                     <div class="line">Go, Biondello, bid your mistress come to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">I go.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Son, I'll be your half, Bianca comes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I'll have no halves; I'll bear it all myself.</div>
                     <p>Re-enter BIONDELLO</p>
                     <div class="line">How now! what news?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sir, my mistress sends you word</div>
                     <div class="line">That she is busy and she cannot come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">How! she is busy and she cannot come!</div>
                     <div class="line">Is that an answer?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Ay, and a kind one too:</div>
                     <div class="line">Pray God, sir, your wife send you not a worse.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I hope better.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah Biondello, go and entreat my wife</div>
                     <div class="line">To come to me forthwith.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit BIONDELLO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">O, ho! entreat her!</div>
                     <div class="line">Nay, then she must needs come.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I am afraid, sir,</div>
                     <div class="line">Do what you can, yours will not be entreated.</div>
                     <p>Re-enter BIONDELLO</p>
                     <div class="line">Now, where's my wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                     <div class="line">She says you have some goodly jest in hand:</div>
                     <div class="line">She will not come: she bids you come to her.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Worse and worse; she will not come! O vile,</div>
                     <div class="line">Intolerable, not to be endured!</div>
                     <div class="line">Sirrah Grumio, go to your mistress;</div>
                     <div class="line">Say, I command her to come to me.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit GRUMIO</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">I know her answer.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">What?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">She will not.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">The fouler fortune mine, and there an end.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                     <div class="line">Now, by my holidame, here comes Katharina!</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Re-enter KATARINA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">What is your will, sir, that you send for me?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Where is your sister, and Hortensio's wife?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                     <div class="line">They sit conferring by the parlor fire.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Go fetch them hither: if they deny to come.</div>
                     <div class="line">Swinge me them soundly forth unto their husbands:</div>
                     <div class="line">Away, I say, and bring them hither straight.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <p>Exit KATHARINA</p>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Here is a wonder, if you talk of a wonder.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                     <div class="line">And so it is: I wonder what it bodes.</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                     <div class="line">Marry, peace it bodes, and love and quiet life,</div>
                     <div class="line">And awful rule and right supremacy;</div>
                     <div class="line">And, to be short, what not, that's sweet and happy?</div>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="dialogue">
                  <div class="linegroup">
                     <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
