                              <div class="line">Talk not to me: I will go sit and weep</div>
                              <div class="line">Till I can find occasion of revenge.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Was ever gentleman thus grieved as I?</div>
                              <div class="line">But who comes here?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter GREMIO, LUCENTIO in the habit of a mean man;
PETRUCHIO, with HORTENSIO as a musician; and TRANIO,
with BIONDELLO bearing a lute and books</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, neighbour Baptista.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, neighbour Gremio.</div>
                              <div class="line">God save you, gentlemen!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, good sir! Pray, have you not a daughter</div>
                              <div class="line">Call'd Katharina, fair and virtuous?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a daughter, sir, called Katharina.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are too blunt: go to it orderly.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You wrong me, Signior Gremio: give me leave.</div>
                              <div class="line">I am a gentleman of Verona, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, hearing of her beauty and her wit,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her affability and bashful modesty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Her wondrous qualities and mild behavior,</div>
                              <div class="line">Am bold to show myself a forward guest</div>
                              <div class="line">Within your house, to make mine eye the witness</div>
                              <div class="line">Of that report which I so oft have heard.</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for an entrance to my entertainment,</div>
                              <div class="line">I do present you with a man of mine,</div>
                              <p>Presenting HORTENSIO</p>
                              <div class="line">Cunning in music and the mathematics,</div>
                              <div class="line">To instruct her fully in those sciences,</div>
                              <div class="line">Whereof I know she is not ignorant:</div>
                              <div class="line">Accept of him, or else you do me wrong:</div>
                              <div class="line">His name is Licio, born in Mantua.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">You're welcome, sir; and he, for your good sake.</div>
                              <div class="line">But for my daughter Katharina, this I know,</div>
                              <div class="line">She is not for your turn, the more my grief.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I see you do not mean to part with her,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else you like not of my company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistake me not; I speak but as I find.</div>
                              <div class="line">Whence are you, sir? what may I call your name?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Petruchio is my name; Antonio's son,</div>
                              <div class="line">A man well known throughout all Italy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know him well: you are welcome for his sake.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Saving your tale, Petruchio, I pray,</div>
                              <div class="line">Let us, that are poor petitioners, speak too:</div>
                              <div class="line">Baccare! you are marvellous forward.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, pardon me, Signior Gremio; I would fain be doing.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I doubt it not, sir; but you will curse your</div>
                              <div class="line">wooing. Neighbour, this is a gift very grateful, I am</div>
                              <div class="line">sure of it. To express the like kindness, myself,</div>
                              <div class="line">that have been more kindly beholding to you than</div>
                              <div class="line">any, freely give unto you this young scholar,</div>
                              <p>Presenting LUCENTIO</p>
                              <div class="line">that hath been long studying at Rheims; as cunning</div>
                              <div class="line">in Greek, Latin, and other languages, as the other</div>
                              <div class="line">in music and mathematics: his name is Cambio; pray,</div>
                              <div class="line">accept his service.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">A thousand thanks, Signior Gremio.</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome, good Cambio.</div>
                              <p>To TRANIO</p>
                              <div class="line">But, gentle sir, methinks you walk like a stranger:</div>
                              <div class="line">may I be so bold to know the cause of your coming?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pardon me, sir, the boldness is mine own,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, being a stranger in this city here,</div>
                              <div class="line">Do make myself a suitor to your daughter,</div>
                              <div class="line">Unto Bianca, fair and virtuous.</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor is your firm resolve unknown to me,</div>
                              <div class="line">In the preferment of the eldest sister.</div>
                              <div class="line">This liberty is all that I request,</div>
                              <div class="line">That, upon knowledge of my parentage,</div>
                              <div class="line">I may have welcome 'mongst the rest that woo</div>
                              <div class="line">And free access and favour as the rest:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, toward the education of your daughters,</div>
                              <div class="line">I here bestow a simple instrument,</div>
                              <div class="line">And this small packet of Greek and Latin books:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you accept them, then their worth is great.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Lucentio is your name; of whence, I pray?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Pisa, sir; son to Vincentio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">A mighty man of Pisa; by report</div>
                              <div class="line">I know him well: you are very welcome, sir,</div>
                              <div class="line">Take you the lute, and you the set of books;</div>
                              <div class="line">You shall go see your pupils presently.</div>
                              <div class="line">Holla, within!</div>
                              <p>Enter a Servant</p>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, lead these gentlemen</div>
                              <div class="line">To my daughters; and tell them both,</div>
                              <div class="line">These are their tutors: bid them use them well.</div>
                              <p>Exit Servant, with LUCENTIO and HORTENSIO,
BIONDELLO following</p>
                              <div class="line">We will go walk a little in the orchard,</div>
                              <div class="line">And then to dinner. You are passing welcome,</div>
                              <div class="line">And so I pray you all to think yourselves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Baptista, my business asketh haste,</div>
                              <div class="line">And every day I cannot come to woo.</div>
                              <div class="line">You knew my father well, and in him me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Left solely heir to all his lands and goods,</div>
                              <div class="line">Which I have better'd rather than decreased:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then tell me, if I get your daughter's love,</div>
                              <div class="line">What dowry shall I have with her to wife?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">After my death the one half of my lands,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in possession twenty thousand crowns.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for that dowry, I'll assure her of</div>
                              <div class="line">Her widowhood, be it that she survive me,</div>
                              <div class="line">In all my lands and leases whatsoever:</div>
                              <div class="line">Let specialties be therefore drawn between us,</div>
                              <div class="line">That covenants may be kept on either hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, when the special thing is well obtain'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">That is, her love; for that is all in all.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, that is nothing: for I tell you, father,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am as peremptory as she proud-minded;</div>
                              <div class="line">And where two raging fires meet together</div>
                              <div class="line">They do consume the thing that feeds their fury:</div>
                              <div class="line">Though little fire grows great with little wind,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet extreme gusts will blow out fire and all:</div>
                              <div class="line">So I to her and so she yields to me;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I am rough and woo not like a babe.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well mayst thou woo, and happy be thy speed!</div>
                              <div class="line">But be thou arm'd for some unhappy words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, to the proof; as mountains are for winds,</div>
                              <div class="line">That shake not, though they blow perpetually.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter HORTENSIO, with his head broke</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">How now, my friend! why dost thou look so pale?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">For fear, I promise you, if I look pale.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, will my daughter prove a good musician?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I think she'll sooner prove a soldier</div>
                              <div class="line">Iron may hold with her, but never lutes.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then thou canst not break her to the lute?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, no; for she hath broke the lute to me.</div>
                              <div class="line">I did but tell her she mistook her frets,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bow'd her hand to teach her fingering;</div>
                              <div class="line">When, with a most impatient devilish spirit,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Frets, call you these?' quoth she; 'I'll fume</div>
                              <div class="line">with them:'</div>
                              <div class="line">And, with that word, she struck me on the head,</div>
                              <div class="line">And through the instrument my pate made way;</div>
                              <div class="line">And there I stood amazed for a while,</div>
                              <div class="line">As on a pillory, looking through the lute;</div>
                              <div class="line">While she did call me rascal fiddler</div>
                              <div class="line">And twangling Jack; with twenty such vile terms,</div>
                              <div class="line">As had she studied to misuse me so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by the world, it is a lusty wench;</div>
                              <div class="line">I love her ten times more than e'er I did:</div>
                              <div class="line">O, how I long to have some chat with her!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, go with me and be not so discomfited:</div>
                              <div class="line">Proceed in practise with my younger daughter;</div>
                              <div class="line">She's apt to learn and thankful for good turns.</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Petruchio, will you go with us,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or shall I send my daughter Kate to you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you do.</div>
                              <p>Exeunt all but PETRUCHIO</p>
                              <div class="line">I will attend her here,</div>
                              <div class="line">And woo her with some spirit when she comes.</div>
                              <div class="line">Say that she rail; why then I'll tell her plain</div>
                              <div class="line">She sings as sweetly as a nightingale:</div>
                              <div class="line">Say that she frown, I'll say she looks as clear</div>
                              <div class="line">As morning roses newly wash'd with dew:</div>
                              <div class="line">Say she be mute and will not speak a word;</div>
                              <div class="line">Then I'll commend her volubility,</div>
                              <div class="line">And say she uttereth piercing eloquence:</div>
                              <div class="line">If she do bid me pack, I'll give her thanks,</div>
                              <div class="line">As though she bid me stay by her a week:</div>
                              <div class="line">If she deny to wed, I'll crave the day</div>
                              <div class="line">When I shall ask the banns and when be married.</div>
                              <div class="line">But here she comes; and now, Petruchio, speak.</div>
                              <p>Enter KATHARINA</p>
                              <div class="line">Good morrow, Kate; for that's your name, I hear.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well have you heard, but something hard of hearing:</div>
                              <div class="line">They call me Katharina that do talk of me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You lie, in faith; for you are call'd plain Kate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bonny Kate and sometimes Kate the curst;</div>
                              <div class="line">But Kate, the prettiest Kate in Christendom</div>
                              <div class="line">Kate of Kate Hall, my super-dainty Kate,</div>
                              <div class="line">For dainties are all Kates, and therefore, Kate,</div>
                              <div class="line">Take this of me, Kate of my consolation;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hearing thy mildness praised in every town,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy virtues spoke of, and thy beauty sounded,</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet not so deeply as to thee belongs,</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself am moved to woo thee for my wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Moved! in good time: let him that moved you hither</div>
                              <div class="line">Remove you hence: I knew you at the first</div>
                              <div class="line">You were a moveable.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what's a moveable?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">A join'd-stool.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast hit it: come, sit on me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Asses are made to bear, and so are you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Women are made to bear, and so are you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">No such jade as you, if me you mean.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas! good Kate, I will not burden thee;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, knowing thee to be but young and light--</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Too light for such a swain as you to catch;</div>
                              <div class="line">And yet as heavy as my weight should be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Should be! should--buzz!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well ta'en, and like a buzzard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O slow-wing'd turtle! shall a buzzard take thee?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, for a turtle, as he takes a buzzard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, come, you wasp; i' faith, you are too angry.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">If I be waspish, best beware my sting.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">My remedy is then, to pluck it out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, if the fool could find it where it lies,</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Who knows not where a wasp does</div>
                              <div class="line">wear his sting? In his tail.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">In his tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Whose tongue?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yours, if you talk of tails: and so farewell.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, with my tongue in your tail? nay, come again,</div>
                              <div class="line">Good Kate; I am a gentleman.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">That I'll try.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>She strikes him</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I swear I'll cuff you, if you strike again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">So may you lose your arms:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you strike me, you are no gentleman;</div>
                              <div class="line">And if no gentleman, why then no arms.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A herald, Kate? O, put me in thy books!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">What is your crest? a coxcomb?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A combless cock, so Kate will be my hen.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">No cock of mine; you crow too like a craven.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, come, Kate, come; you must not look so sour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">It is my fashion, when I see a crab.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, here's no crab; and therefore look not sour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">There is, there is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then show it me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Had I a glass, I would.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What, you mean my face?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well aim'd of such a young one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, by Saint George, I am too young for you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet you are wither'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis with cares.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I care not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, hear you, Kate: in sooth you scape not so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I chafe you, if I tarry: let me go.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, not a whit: I find you passing gentle.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas told me you were rough and coy and sullen,</div>
                              <div class="line">And now I find report a very liar;</div>
                              <div class="line">For thou are pleasant, gamesome, passing courteous,</div>
                              <div class="line">But slow in speech, yet sweet as spring-time flowers:</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou canst not frown, thou canst not look askance,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor bite the lip, as angry wenches will,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor hast thou pleasure to be cross in talk,</div>
                              <div class="line">But thou with mildness entertain'st thy wooers,</div>
                              <div class="line">With gentle conference, soft and affable.</div>
                              <div class="line">Why does the world report that Kate doth limp?</div>
                              <div class="line">O slanderous world! Kate like the hazel-twig</div>
                              <div class="line">Is straight and slender and as brown in hue</div>
                              <div class="line">As hazel nuts and sweeter than the kernels.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, let me see thee walk: thou dost not halt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, fool, and whom thou keep'st command.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Did ever Dian so become a grove</div>
                              <div class="line">As Kate this chamber with her princely gait?</div>
                              <div class="line">O, be thou Dian, and let her be Kate;</div>
                              <div class="line">And then let Kate be chaste and Dian sportful!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Where did you study all this goodly speech?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It is extempore, from my mother-wit.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">A witty mother! witless else her son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Am I not wise?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Yes; keep you warm.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, so I mean, sweet Katharina, in thy bed:</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore, setting all this chat aside,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus in plain terms: your father hath consented</div>
                              <div class="line">That you shall be my wife; your dowry 'greed on;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, Will you, nill you, I will marry you.</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Kate, I am a husband for your turn;</div>
                              <div class="line">For, by this light, whereby I see thy beauty,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy beauty, that doth make me like thee well,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou must be married to no man but me;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I am he am born to tame you Kate,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring you from a wild Kate to a Kate</div>
                              <div class="line">Conformable as other household Kates.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes your father: never make denial;</div>
                              <div class="line">I must and will have Katharina to my wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter BAPTISTA, GREMIO, and TRANIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, Signior Petruchio, how speed you with my daughter?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">How but well, sir? how but well?</div>
                              <div class="line">It were impossible I should speed amiss.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, how now, daughter Katharina! in your dumps?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Call you me daughter? now, I promise you</div>
                              <div class="line">You have show'd a tender fatherly regard,</div>
                              <div class="line">To wish me wed to one half lunatic;</div>
                              <div class="line">A mad-cup ruffian and a swearing Jack,</div>
                              <div class="line">That thinks with oaths to face the matter out.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Father, 'tis thus: yourself and all the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">That talk'd of her, have talk'd amiss of her:</div>
                              <div class="line">If she be curst, it is for policy,</div>
                              <div class="line">For she's not froward, but modest as the dove;</div>
                              <div class="line">She is not hot, but temperate as the morn;</div>
                              <div class="line">For patience she will prove a second Grissel,</div>
                              <div class="line">And Roman Lucrece for her chastity:</div>
                              <div class="line">And to conclude, we have 'greed so well together,</div>
                              <div class="line">That upon Sunday is the wedding-day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll see thee hang'd on Sunday first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Hark, Petruchio; she says she'll see thee</div>
                              <div class="line">hang'd first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is this your speeding? nay, then, good night our part!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Be patient, gentlemen; I choose her for myself:</div>
                              <div class="line">If she and I be pleased, what's that to you?</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis bargain'd 'twixt us twain, being alone,</div>
                              <div class="line">That she shall still be curst in company.</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell you, 'tis incredible to believe</div>
                              <div class="line">How much she loves me: O, the kindest Kate!</div>
                              <div class="line">She hung about my neck; and kiss on kiss</div>
                              <div class="line">She vied so fast, protesting oath on oath,</div>
                              <div class="line">That in a twink she won me to her love.</div>
                              <div class="line">O, you are novices! 'tis a world to see,</div>
                              <div class="line">How tame, when men and women are alone,</div>
                              <div class="line">A meacock wretch can make the curstest shrew.</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me thy hand, Kate: I will unto Venice,</div>
                              <div class="line">To buy apparel 'gainst the wedding-day.</div>
                              <div class="line">Provide the feast, father, and bid the guests;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be sure my Katharina shall be fine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not what to say: but give me your hands;</div>
                              <div class="line">God send you joy, Petruchio! 'tis a match.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Amen, say we: we will be witnesses.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Father, and wife, and gentlemen, adieu;</div>
                              <div class="line">I will to Venice; Sunday comes apace:</div>
                              <div class="line">We will have rings and things and fine array;</div>
                              <div class="line">And kiss me, Kate, we will be married o'Sunday.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt PETRUCHIO and KATHARINA severally</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Was ever match clapp'd up so suddenly?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, gentlemen, now I play a merchant's part,</div>
                              <div class="line">And venture madly on a desperate mart.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twas a commodity lay fretting by you:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twill bring you gain, or perish on the seas.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">The gain I seek is, quiet in the match.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No doubt but he hath got a quiet catch.</div>
                              <div class="line">But now, Baptists, to your younger daughter:</div>
                              <div class="line">Now is the day we long have looked for:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am your neighbour, and was suitor first.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And I am one that love Bianca more</div>
                              <div class="line">Than words can witness, or your thoughts can guess.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Youngling, thou canst not love so dear as I.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Graybeard, thy love doth freeze.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But thine doth fry.</div>
                              <div class="line">Skipper, stand back: 'tis age that nourisheth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But youth in ladies' eyes that flourisheth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Content you, gentlemen: I will compound this strife:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis deeds must win the prize; and he of both</div>
                              <div class="line">That can assure my daughter greatest dower</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall have my Bianca's love.</div>
                              <div class="line">Say, Signior Gremio, What can you assure her?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">First, as you know, my house within the city</div>
                              <div class="line">Is richly furnished with plate and gold;</div>
                              <div class="line">Basins and ewers to lave her dainty hands;</div>
                              <div class="line">My hangings all of Tyrian tapestry;</div>
                              <div class="line">In ivory coffers I have stuff'd my crowns;</div>
                              <div class="line">In cypress chests my arras counterpoints,</div>
                              <div class="line">Costly apparel, tents, and canopies,</div>
                              <div class="line">Fine linen, Turkey cushions boss'd with pearl,</div>
                              <div class="line">Valance of Venice gold in needlework,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pewter and brass and all things that belong</div>
                              <div class="line">To house or housekeeping: then, at my farm</div>
                              <div class="line">I have a hundred milch-kine to the pail,</div>
                              <div class="line">Sixscore fat oxen standing in my stalls,</div>
                              <div class="line">And all things answerable to this portion.</div>
                              <div class="line">Myself am struck in years, I must confess;</div>
                              <div class="line">And if I die to-morrow, this is hers,</div>
                              <div class="line">If whilst I live she will be only mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That 'only' came well in. Sir, list to me:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am my father's heir and only son:</div>
                              <div class="line">If I may have your daughter to my wife,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll leave her houses three or four as good,</div>
                              <div class="line">Within rich Pisa walls, as any one</div>
                              <div class="line">Old Signior Gremio has in Padua;</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides two thousand ducats by the year</div>
                              <div class="line">Of fruitful land, all which shall be her jointure.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, have I pinch'd you, Signior Gremio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Two thousand ducats by the year of land!</div>
                              <div class="line">My land amounts not to so much in all:</div>
                              <div class="line">That she shall have; besides an argosy</div>
                              <div class="line">That now is lying in Marseilles' road.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, have I choked you with an argosy?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Gremio, 'tis known my father hath no less</div>
                              <div class="line">Than three great argosies; besides two galliases,</div>
                              <div class="line">And twelve tight galleys: these I will assure her,</div>
                              <div class="line">And twice as much, whate'er thou offer'st next.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I have offer'd all, I have no more;</div>
                              <div class="line">And she can have no more than all I have:</div>
                              <div class="line">If you like me, she shall have me and mine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, then the maid is mine from all the world,</div>
                              <div class="line">By your firm promise: Gremio is out-vied.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">I must confess your offer is the best;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, let your father make her the assurance,</div>
                              <div class="line">She is your own; else, you must pardon me,</div>
                              <div class="line">if you should die before him, where's her dower?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That's but a cavil: he is old, I young.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And may not young men die, as well as old?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, gentlemen,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am thus resolved: on Sunday next you know</div>
                              <div class="line">My daughter Katharina is to be married:</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, on the Sunday following, shall Bianca</div>
                              <div class="line">Be bride to you, if you this assurance;</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, Signior Gremio:</div>
                              <div class="line">And so, I take my leave, and thank you both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GREMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Adieu, good neighbour.</div>
                              <p>Exit BAPTISTA</p>
                              <div class="line">Now I fear thee not:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah young gamester, your father were a fool</div>
                              <div class="line">To give thee all, and in his waning age</div>
                              <div class="line">Set foot under thy table: tut, a toy!</div>
                              <div class="line">An old Italian fox is not so kind, my boy.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">A vengeance on your crafty wither'd hide!</div>
                              <div class="line">Yet I have faced it with a card of ten.</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis in my head to do my master good:</div>
                              <div class="line">I see no reason but supposed Lucentio</div>
                              <div class="line">Must get a father, call'd 'supposed Vincentio;'</div>
                              <div class="line">And that's a wonder: fathers commonly</div>
                              <div class="line">Do get their children; but in this case of wooing,</div>
                              <div class="line">A child shall get a sire, if I fail not of my cunning.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
               </div>
            </article>
            <article class="chapter" id="R.1.6">
               <header class="chapter-titlepage">
                  <h2>Chapter 4. ACT III</h2>
               </header>
               <div class="lists-of-titles">
                  <div class="toc">
                     <p>
                        <b>Table of Contents</b>
                     </p>
                     <ul class="toc">
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.2">1. SCENE I.  Padua. BAPTISTA'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                        <li>
                           <span>
                              <a href="#R.1.6.3">2. SCENE II.  Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.</a>
                           </span>
                        </li>
                     </ul>
                  </div>
               </div>
               <div class="content">
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.6.2">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>1. SCENE I.  Padua. BAPTISTA'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter LUCENTIO, HORTENSIO, and BIANCA</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fiddler, forbear; you grow too forward, sir:</div>
                              <div class="line">Have you so soon forgot the entertainment</div>
                              <div class="line">Her sister Katharina welcomed you withal?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But, wrangling pedant, this is</div>
                              <div class="line">The patroness of heavenly harmony:</div>
                              <div class="line">Then give me leave to have prerogative;</div>
                              <div class="line">And when in music we have spent an hour,</div>
                              <div class="line">Your lecture shall have leisure for as much.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Preposterous ass, that never read so far</div>
                              <div class="line">To know the cause why music was ordain'd!</div>
                              <div class="line">Was it not to refresh the mind of man</div>
                              <div class="line">After his studies or his usual pain?</div>
                              <div class="line">Then give me leave to read philosophy,</div>
                              <div class="line">And while I pause, serve in your harmony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sirrah, I will not bear these braves of thine.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, gentlemen, you do me double wrong,</div>
                              <div class="line">To strive for that which resteth in my choice:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am no breeching scholar in the schools;</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll not be tied to hours nor 'pointed times,</div>
                              <div class="line">But learn my lessons as I please myself.</div>
                              <div class="line">And, to cut off all strife, here sit we down:</div>
                              <div class="line">Take you your instrument, play you the whiles;</div>
                              <div class="line">His lecture will be done ere you have tuned.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You'll leave his lecture when I am in tune?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">That will be never: tune your instrument.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Where left we last?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, madam:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Hic ibat Simois; hic est Sigeia tellus;</div>
                              <div class="line">Hic steterat Priami regia celsa senis.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Construe them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Hic ibat,' as I told you before, 'Simois,' I am</div>
                              <div class="line">Lucentio, 'hic est,' son unto Vincentio of Pisa,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Sigeia tellus,' disguised thus to get your love;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Hic steterat,' and that Lucentio that comes</div>
                              <div class="line">a-wooing, 'Priami,' is my man Tranio, 'regia,'</div>
                              <div class="line">bearing my port, 'celsa senis,' that we might</div>
                              <div class="line">beguile the old pantaloon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, my instrument's in tune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's hear. O fie! the treble jars.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Spit in the hole, man, and tune again.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Now let me see if I can construe it: 'Hic ibat</div>
                              <div class="line">Simois,' I know you not, 'hic est Sigeia tellus,' I</div>
                              <div class="line">trust you not; 'Hic steterat Priami,' take heed</div>
                              <div class="line">he hear us not, 'regia,' presume not, 'celsa senis,'</div>
                              <div class="line">despair not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, 'tis now in tune.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">All but the base.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The base is right; 'tis the base knave that jars.</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">How fiery and forward our pedant is!</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, for my life, the knave doth court my love:</div>
                              <div class="line">Pedascule, I'll watch you better yet.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">In time I may believe, yet I mistrust.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistrust it not: for, sure, AEacides</div>
                              <div class="line">Was Ajax, call'd so from his grandfather.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">I must believe my master; else, I promise you,</div>
                              <div class="line">I should be arguing still upon that doubt:</div>
                              <div class="line">But let it rest. Now, Licio, to you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Good masters, take it not unkindly, pray,</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have been thus pleasant with you both.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You may go walk, and give me leave a while:</div>
                              <div class="line">My lessons make no music in three parts.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Are you so formal, sir? well, I must wait,</div>
                              <p>Aside</p>
                              <div class="line">And watch withal; for, but I be deceived,</div>
                              <div class="line">Our fine musician groweth amorous.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Madam, before you touch the instrument,</div>
                              <div class="line">To learn the order of my fingering,</div>
                              <div class="line">I must begin with rudiments of art;</div>
                              <div class="line">To teach you gamut in a briefer sort,</div>
                              <div class="line">More pleasant, pithy and effectual,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than hath been taught by any of my trade:</div>
                              <div class="line">And there it is in writing, fairly drawn.</div>
