                              <div class="line">And I expressly am forbid to touch it,</div>
                              <div class="line">For it engenders choler, planteth anger;</div>
                              <div class="line">And better 'twere that both of us did fast,</div>
                              <div class="line">Since, of ourselves, ourselves are choleric,</div>
                              <div class="line">Than feed it with such over-roasted flesh.</div>
                              <div class="line">Be patient; to-morrow 't shall be mended,</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for this night, we'll fast for company:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, I will bring thee to thy bridal chamber.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <p>Re-enter Servants severally</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">NATHANIEL</div>
                              <div class="line">Peter, didst ever see the like?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETER</div>
                              <div class="line">He kills her in her own humour.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Re-enter CURTIS</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Where is he?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">CURTIS</div>
                              <div class="line">In her chamber, making a sermon of continency to her;</div>
                              <div class="line">And rails, and swears, and rates, that she, poor soul,</div>
                              <div class="line">Knows not which way to stand, to look, to speak,</div>
                              <div class="line">And sits as one new-risen from a dream.</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, away! for he is coming hither.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                        <p>Re-enter PETRUCHIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thus have I politicly begun my reign,</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'tis my hope to end successfully.</div>
                              <div class="line">My falcon now is sharp and passing empty;</div>
                              <div class="line">And till she stoop she must not be full-gorged,</div>
                              <div class="line">For then she never looks upon her lure.</div>
                              <div class="line">Another way I have to man my haggard,</div>
                              <div class="line">To make her come and know her keeper's call,</div>
                              <div class="line">That is, to watch her, as we watch these kites</div>
                              <div class="line">That bate and beat and will not be obedient.</div>
                              <div class="line">She eat no meat to-day, nor none shall eat;</div>
                              <div class="line">Last night she slept not, nor to-night she shall not;</div>
                              <div class="line">As with the meat, some undeserved fault</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll find about the making of the bed;</div>
                              <div class="line">And here I'll fling the pillow, there the bolster,</div>
                              <div class="line">This way the coverlet, another way the sheets:</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and amid this hurly I intend</div>
                              <div class="line">That all is done in reverend care of her;</div>
                              <div class="line">And in conclusion she shall watch all night:</div>
                              <div class="line">And if she chance to nod I'll rail and brawl</div>
                              <div class="line">And with the clamour keep her still awake.</div>
                              <div class="line">This is a way to kill a wife with kindness;</div>
                              <div class="line">And thus I'll curb her mad and headstrong humour.</div>
                              <div class="line">He that knows better how to tame a shrew,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now let him speak: 'tis charity to show.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.3">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>2. SCENE II.  Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter TRANIO and HORTENSIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Is't possible, friend Licio, that Mistress Bianca</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth fancy any other but Lucentio?</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell you, sir, she bears me fair in hand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, to satisfy you in what I have said,</div>
                              <div class="line">Stand by and mark the manner of his teaching.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BIANCA and LUCENTIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Now, mistress, profit you in what you read?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">What, master, read you? first resolve me that.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I read that I profess, the Art to Love.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">And may you prove, sir, master of your art!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">While you, sweet dear, prove mistress of my heart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Quick proceeders, marry! Now, tell me, I pray,</div>
                              <div class="line">You that durst swear at your mistress Bianca</div>
                              <div class="line">Loved none in the world so well as Lucentio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O despiteful love! unconstant womankind!</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell thee, Licio, this is wonderful.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistake no more: I am not Licio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor a musician, as I seem to be;</div>
                              <div class="line">But one that scorn to live in this disguise,</div>
                              <div class="line">For such a one as leaves a gentleman,</div>
                              <div class="line">And makes a god of such a cullion:</div>
                              <div class="line">Know, sir, that I am call'd Hortensio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Hortensio, I have often heard</div>
                              <div class="line">Of your entire affection to Bianca;</div>
                              <div class="line">And since mine eyes are witness of her lightness,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will with you, if you be so contented,</div>
                              <div class="line">Forswear Bianca and her love for ever.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">See, how they kiss and court! Signior Lucentio,</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is my hand, and here I firmly vow</div>
                              <div class="line">Never to woo her no more, but do forswear her,</div>
                              <div class="line">As one unworthy all the former favours</div>
                              <div class="line">That I have fondly flatter'd her withal.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And here I take the unfeigned oath,</div>
                              <div class="line">Never to marry with her though she would entreat:</div>
                              <div class="line">Fie on her! see, how beastly she doth court him!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Would all the world but he had quite forsworn!</div>
                              <div class="line">For me, that I may surely keep mine oath,</div>
                              <div class="line">I will be married to a wealthy widow,</div>
                              <div class="line">Ere three days pass, which hath as long loved me</div>
                              <div class="line">As I have loved this proud disdainful haggard.</div>
                              <div class="line">And so farewell, Signior Lucentio.</div>
                              <div class="line">Kindness in women, not their beauteous looks,</div>
                              <div class="line">Shall win my love: and so I take my leave,</div>
                              <div class="line">In resolution as I swore before.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress Bianca, bless you with such grace</div>
                              <div class="line">As 'longeth to a lover's blessed case!</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay, I have ta'en you napping, gentle love,</div>
                              <div class="line">And have forsworn you with Hortensio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">Tranio, you jest: but have you both forsworn me?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress, we have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then we are rid of Licio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I' faith, he'll have a lusty widow now,</div>
                              <div class="line">That shall be wood and wedded in a day.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">God give him joy!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, and he'll tame her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">He says so, Tranio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, he is gone unto the taming-school.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIANCA</div>
                              <div class="line">The taming-school! what, is there such a place?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, mistress, and Petruchio is the master;</div>
                              <div class="line">That teacheth tricks eleven and twenty long,</div>
                              <div class="line">To tame a shrew and charm her chattering tongue.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter BIONDELLO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">O master, master, I have watch'd so long</div>
                              <div class="line">That I am dog-weary: but at last I spied</div>
                              <div class="line">An ancient angel coming down the hill,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will serve the turn.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What is he, Biondello?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, a mercatante, or a pedant,</div>
                              <div class="line">I know not what; but format in apparel,</div>
                              <div class="line">In gait and countenance surely like a father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And what of him, Tranio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">If he be credulous and trust my tale,</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll make him glad to seem Vincentio,</div>
                              <div class="line">And give assurance to Baptista Minola,</div>
                              <div class="line">As if he were the right Vincentio</div>
                              <div class="line">Take in your love, and then let me alone.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt LUCENTIO and BIANCA</p>
                        <p>Enter a Pedant</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">God save you, sir!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">And you, sir! you are welcome.</div>
                              <div class="line">Travel you far on, or are you at the farthest?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, at the farthest for a week or two:</div>
                              <div class="line">But then up farther, and as for as Rome;</div>
                              <div class="line">And so to Tripoli, if God lend me life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What countryman, I pray?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Mantua.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Of Mantua, sir? marry, God forbid!</div>
                              <div class="line">And come to Padua, careless of your life?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">My life, sir! how, I pray? for that goes hard.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis death for any one in Mantua</div>
                              <div class="line">To come to Padua. Know you not the cause?</div>
                              <div class="line">Your ships are stay'd at Venice, and the duke,</div>
                              <div class="line">For private quarrel 'twixt your duke and him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Hath publish'd and proclaim'd it openly:</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis, marvel, but that you are but newly come,</div>
                              <div class="line">You might have heard it else proclaim'd about.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">Alas! sir, it is worse for me than so;</div>
                              <div class="line">For I have bills for money by exchange</div>
                              <div class="line">From Florence and must here deliver them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, to do you courtesy,</div>
                              <div class="line">This will I do, and this I will advise you:</div>
                              <div class="line">First, tell me, have you ever been at Pisa?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, sir, in Pisa have I often been,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pisa renowned for grave citizens.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Among them know you one Vincentio?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">I know him not, but I have heard of him;</div>
                              <div class="line">A merchant of incomparable wealth.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">He is my father, sir; and, sooth to say,</div>
                              <div class="line">In countenance somewhat doth resemble you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  As much as an apple doth an oyster,</div>
                              <div class="line">and all one.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">To save your life in this extremity,</div>
                              <div class="line">This favour will I do you for his sake;</div>
                              <div class="line">And think it not the worst of an your fortunes</div>
                              <div class="line">That you are like to Sir Vincentio.</div>
                              <div class="line">His name and credit shall you undertake,</div>
                              <div class="line">And in my house you shall be friendly lodged:</div>
                              <div class="line">Look that you take upon you as you should;</div>
                              <div class="line">You understand me, sir: so shall you stay</div>
                              <div class="line">Till you have done your business in the city:</div>
                              <div class="line">If this be courtesy, sir, accept of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">O sir, I do; and will repute you ever</div>
                              <div class="line">The patron of my life and liberty.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then go with me to make the matter good.</div>
                              <div class="line">This, by the way, I let you understand;</div>
                              <div class="line">my father is here look'd for every day,</div>
                              <div class="line">To pass assurance of a dower in marriage</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twixt me and one Baptista's daughter here:</div>
                              <div class="line">In all these circumstances I'll instruct you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Go with me to clothe you as becomes you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.4">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>3. SCENE III.  A room in PETRUCHIO'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter KATHARINA and GRUMIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">No, no, forsooth; I dare not for my life.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">The more my wrong, the more his spite appears:</div>
                              <div class="line">What, did he marry me to famish me?</div>
                              <div class="line">Beggars, that come unto my father's door,</div>
                              <div class="line">Upon entreaty have a present aims;</div>
                              <div class="line">If not, elsewhere they meet with charity:</div>
                              <div class="line">But I, who never knew how to entreat,</div>
                              <div class="line">Nor never needed that I should entreat,</div>
                              <div class="line">Am starved for meat, giddy for lack of sleep,</div>
                              <div class="line">With oath kept waking and with brawling fed:</div>
                              <div class="line">And that which spites me more than all these wants,</div>
                              <div class="line">He does it under name of perfect love;</div>
                              <div class="line">As who should say, if I should sleep or eat,</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere deadly sickness or else present death.</div>
                              <div class="line">I prithee go and get me some repast;</div>
                              <div class="line">I care not what, so it be wholesome food.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you to a neat's foot?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis passing good: I prithee let me have it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I fear it is too choleric a meat.</div>
                              <div class="line">How say you to a fat tripe finely broil'd?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I like it well: good Grumio, fetch it me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I cannot tell; I fear 'tis choleric.</div>
                              <div class="line">What say you to a piece of beef and mustard?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">A dish that I do love to feed upon.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, but the mustard is too hot a little.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then, the beef, and let the mustard rest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Nay then, I will not: you shall have the mustard,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else you get no beef of Grumio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Then both, or one, or any thing thou wilt.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why then, the mustard without the beef.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, get thee gone, thou false deluding slave,</div>
                              <p>Beats him</p>
                              <div class="line">That feed'st me with the very name of meat:</div>
                              <div class="line">Sorrow on thee and all the pack of you,</div>
                              <div class="line">That triumph thus upon my misery!</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, get thee gone, I say.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Enter PETRUCHIO and HORTENSIO with meat</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">How fares my Kate? What, sweeting, all amort?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Mistress, what cheer?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, as cold as can be.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Pluck up thy spirits; look cheerfully upon me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here love; thou see'st how diligent I am</div>
                              <div class="line">To dress thy meat myself and bring it thee:</div>
                              <div class="line">I am sure, sweet Kate, this kindness merits thanks.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, not a word? Nay, then thou lovest it not;</div>
                              <div class="line">And all my pains is sorted to no proof.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here, take away this dish.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you, let it stand.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The poorest service is repaid with thanks;</div>
                              <div class="line">And so shall mine, before you touch the meat.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, sir.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Petruchio, fie! you are to blame.</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, mistress Kate, I'll bear you company.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Eat it up all, Hortensio, if thou lovest me.</div>
                              <div class="line">Much good do it unto thy gentle heart!</div>
                              <div class="line">Kate, eat apace: and now, my honey love,</div>
                              <div class="line">Will we return unto thy father's house</div>
                              <div class="line">And revel it as bravely as the best,</div>
                              <div class="line">With silken coats and caps and golden rings,</div>
                              <div class="line">With ruffs and cuffs and fardingales and things;</div>
                              <div class="line">With scarfs and fans and double change of bravery,</div>
                              <div class="line">With amber bracelets, beads and all this knavery.</div>
                              <div class="line">What, hast thou dined? The tailor stays thy leisure,</div>
                              <div class="line">To deck thy body with his ruffling treasure.</div>
                              <p>Enter Tailor</p>
                              <div class="line">Come, tailor, let us see these ornaments;</div>
                              <div class="line">Lay forth the gown.</div>
                              <p>Enter Haberdasher</p>
                              <div class="line">What news with you, sir?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Haberdasher</div>
                              <div class="line">Here is the cap your worship did bespeak.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, this was moulded on a porringer;</div>
                              <div class="line">A velvet dish: fie, fie! 'tis lewd and filthy:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, 'tis a cockle or a walnut-shell,</div>
                              <div class="line">A knack, a toy, a trick, a baby's cap:</div>
                              <div class="line">Away with it! come, let me have a bigger.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll have no bigger: this doth fit the time,</div>
                              <div class="line">And gentlewomen wear such caps as these</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">When you are gentle, you shall have one too,</div>
                              <div class="line">And not till then.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  That will not be in haste.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, I trust I may have leave to speak;</div>
                              <div class="line">And speak I will; I am no child, no babe:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your betters have endured me say my mind,</div>
                              <div class="line">And if you cannot, best you stop your ears.</div>
                              <div class="line">My tongue will tell the anger of my heart,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or else my heart concealing it will break,</div>
                              <div class="line">And rather than it shall, I will be free</div>
                              <div class="line">Even to the uttermost, as I please, in words.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, thou say'st true; it is a paltry cap,</div>
                              <div class="line">A custard-coffin, a bauble, a silken pie:</div>
                              <div class="line">I love thee well, in that thou likest it not.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">Love me or love me not, I like the cap;</div>
                              <div class="line">And it I will have, or I will have none.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit Haberdasher</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thy gown? why, ay: come, tailor, let us see't.</div>
                              <div class="line">O mercy, God! what masquing stuff is here?</div>
                              <div class="line">What's this? a sleeve? 'tis like a demi-cannon:</div>
                              <div class="line">What, up and down, carved like an apple-tart?</div>
                              <div class="line">Here's snip and nip and cut and slish and slash,</div>
                              <div class="line">Like to a censer in a barber's shop:</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, what, i' devil's name, tailor, call'st thou this?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  I see she's like to have neither cap nor gown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">You bid me make it orderly and well,</div>
                              <div class="line">According to the fashion and the time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, and did; but if you be remember'd,</div>
                              <div class="line">I did not bid you mar it to the time.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, hop me over every kennel home,</div>
                              <div class="line">For you shall hop without my custom, sir:</div>
                              <div class="line">I'll none of it: hence! make your best of it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I never saw a better-fashion'd gown,</div>
                              <div class="line">More quaint, more pleasing, nor more commendable:</div>
                              <div class="line">Belike you mean to make a puppet of me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, true; he means to make a puppet of thee.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">She says your worship means to make</div>
                              <div class="line">a puppet of her.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O monstrous arrogance! Thou liest, thou thread,</div>
                              <div class="line">thou thimble,</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou yard, three-quarters, half-yard, quarter, nail!</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou flea, thou nit, thou winter-cricket thou!</div>
                              <div class="line">Braved in mine own house with a skein of thread?</div>
                              <div class="line">Away, thou rag, thou quantity, thou remnant;</div>
                              <div class="line">Or I shall so be-mete thee with thy yard</div>
                              <div class="line">As thou shalt think on prating whilst thou livest!</div>
                              <div class="line">I tell thee, I, that thou hast marr'd her gown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Your worship is deceived; the gown is made</div>
                              <div class="line">Just as my master had direction:</div>
                              <div class="line">Grumio gave order how it should be done.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I gave him no order; I gave him the stuff.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">But how did you desire it should be made?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Marry, sir, with needle and thread.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">But did you not request to have it cut?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou hast faced many things.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">I have.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Face not me: thou hast braved many men; brave not</div>
                              <div class="line">me; I will neither be faced nor braved. I say unto</div>
                              <div class="line">thee, I bid thy master cut out the gown; but I did</div>
                              <div class="line">not bid him cut it to pieces: ergo, thou liest.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, here is the note of the fashion to testify</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Read it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">The note lies in's throat, if he say I said so.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'Imprimis, a loose-bodied gown:'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Master, if ever I said loose-bodied gown, sew me in</div>
                              <div class="line">the skirts of it, and beat me to death with a bottom</div>
                              <div class="line">of brown thread: I said a gown.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Proceed.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'With a small compassed cape:'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I confess the cape.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'With a trunk sleeve:'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I confess two sleeves.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Reads</span>  'The sleeves curiously cut.'</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, there's the villany.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Error i' the bill, sir; error i' the bill.</div>
                              <div class="line">I commanded the sleeves should be cut out and</div>
                              <div class="line">sewed up again; and that I'll prove upon thee,</div>
                              <div class="line">though thy little finger be armed in a thimble.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Tailor</div>
                              <div class="line">This is true that I say: an I had thee</div>
                              <div class="line">in place where, thou shouldst know it.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I am for thee straight: take thou the</div>
                              <div class="line">bill, give me thy mete-yard, and spare not me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">God-a-mercy, Grumio! then he shall have no odds.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, sir, in brief, the gown is not for me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">You are i' the right, sir: 'tis for my mistress.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, take it up unto thy master's use.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Villain, not for thy life: take up my mistress'</div>
                              <div class="line">gown for thy master's use!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Why, sir, what's your conceit in that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">GRUMIO</div>
                              <div class="line">O, sir, the conceit is deeper than you think for:</div>
                              <div class="line">Take up my mistress' gown to his master's use!</div>
                              <div class="line">O, fie, fie, fie!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Hortensio, say thou wilt see the tailor paid.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go take it hence; be gone, and say no more.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tailor, I'll pay thee for thy gown tomorrow:</div>
                              <div class="line">Take no unkindness of his hasty words:</div>
                              <div class="line">Away! I say; commend me to thy master.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exit Tailor</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Well, come, my Kate; we will unto your father's</div>
                              <div class="line">Even in these honest mean habiliments:</div>
                              <div class="line">Our purses shall be proud, our garments poor;</div>
                              <div class="line">For 'tis the mind that makes the body rich;</div>
                              <div class="line">And as the sun breaks through the darkest clouds,</div>
                              <div class="line">So honour peereth in the meanest habit.</div>
                              <div class="line">What is the jay more precious than the lark,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because his fathers are more beautiful?</div>
                              <div class="line">Or is the adder better than the eel,</div>
                              <div class="line">Because his painted skin contents the eye?</div>
                              <div class="line">O, no, good Kate; neither art thou the worse</div>
                              <div class="line">For this poor furniture and mean array.</div>
                              <div class="line">if thou account'st it shame. lay it on me;</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore frolic: we will hence forthwith,</div>
                              <div class="line">To feast and sport us at thy father's house.</div>
                              <div class="line">Go, call my men, and let us straight to him;</div>
                              <div class="line">And bring our horses unto Long-lane end;</div>
                              <div class="line">There will we mount, and thither walk on foot</div>
                              <div class="line">Let's see; I think 'tis now some seven o'clock,</div>
                              <div class="line">And well we may come there by dinner-time.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">KATHARINA</div>
                              <div class="line">I dare assure you, sir, 'tis almost two;</div>
                              <div class="line">And 'twill be supper-time ere you come there.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">PETRUCHIO</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be seven ere I go to horse:</div>
                              <div class="line">Look, what I speak, or do, or think to do,</div>
                              <div class="line">You are still crossing it. Sirs, let't alone:</div>
                              <div class="line">I will not go to-day; and ere I do,</div>
                              <div class="line">It shall be what o'clock I say it is.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">HORTENSIO</div>
                              <div class="line">
                                 <span>Aside</span>  Why, so this gallant will command the sun.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt</p>
                     </div>
                  </section>
                  <section class="section" id="R.1.7.5">
                     <div class="section-titlepage">
                        <h2>4. SCENE IV.  Padua. Before BAPTISTA'S house.</h2>
                     </div>
                     <div class="content">
                        <p>Enter TRANIO, and the Pedant dressed like VINCENTIO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, this is the house: please it you that I call?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">Ay, what else? and but I be deceived</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Baptista may remember me,</div>
                              <div class="line">Near twenty years ago, in Genoa,</div>
                              <div class="line">Where we were lodgers at the Pegasus.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">'Tis well; and hold your own, in any case,</div>
                              <div class="line">With such austerity as 'longeth to a father.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">I warrant you.</div>
                              <p>Enter BIONDELLO</p>
                              <div class="line">But, sir, here comes your boy;</div>
                              <div class="line">'Twere good he were school'd.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Fear you not him. Sirrah Biondello,</div>
                              <div class="line">Now do your duty throughly, I advise you:</div>
                              <div class="line">Imagine 'twere the right Vincentio.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Tut, fear not me.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">But hast thou done thy errand to Baptista?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I told him that your father was at Venice,</div>
                              <div class="line">And that you look'd for him this day in Padua.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Thou'rt a tall fellow: hold thee that to drink.</div>
                              <div class="line">Here comes Baptista: set your countenance, sir.</div>
                              <p>Enter BAPTISTA and LUCENTIO</p>
                              <div class="line">Signior Baptista, you are happily met.</div>
                              <p>To the Pedant</p>
                              <div class="line">Sir, this is the gentleman I told you of:</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray you stand good father to me now,</div>
                              <div class="line">Give me Bianca for my patrimony.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">Pedant</div>
                              <div class="line">Soft son!</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, by your leave: having come to Padua</div>
                              <div class="line">To gather in some debts, my son Lucentio</div>
                              <div class="line">Made me acquainted with a weighty cause</div>
                              <div class="line">Of love between your daughter and himself:</div>
                              <div class="line">And, for the good report I hear of you</div>
                              <div class="line">And for the love he beareth to your daughter</div>
                              <div class="line">And she to him, to stay him not too long,</div>
                              <div class="line">I am content, in a good father's care,</div>
                              <div class="line">To have him match'd; and if you please to like</div>
                              <div class="line">No worse than I, upon some agreement</div>
                              <div class="line">Me shall you find ready and willing</div>
                              <div class="line">With one consent to have her so bestow'd;</div>
                              <div class="line">For curious I cannot be with you,</div>
                              <div class="line">Signior Baptista, of whom I hear so well.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Sir, pardon me in what I have to say:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your plainness and your shortness please me well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Right true it is, your son Lucentio here</div>
                              <div class="line">Doth love my daughter and she loveth him,</div>
                              <div class="line">Or both dissemble deeply their affections:</div>
                              <div class="line">And therefore, if you say no more than this,</div>
                              <div class="line">That like a father you will deal with him</div>
                              <div class="line">And pass my daughter a sufficient dower,</div>
                              <div class="line">The match is made, and all is done:</div>
                              <div class="line">Your son shall have my daughter with consent.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I thank you, sir. Where then do you know best</div>
                              <div class="line">We be affied and such assurance ta'en</div>
                              <div class="line">As shall with either part's agreement stand?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">Not in my house, Lucentio; for, you know,</div>
                              <div class="line">Pitchers have ears, and I have many servants:</div>
                              <div class="line">Besides, old Gremio is hearkening still;</div>
                              <div class="line">And happily we might be interrupted.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then at my lodging, an it like you:</div>
                              <div class="line">There doth my father lie; and there, this night,</div>
                              <div class="line">We'll pass the business privately and well.</div>
                              <div class="line">Send for your daughter by your servant here:</div>
                              <div class="line">My boy shall fetch the scrivener presently.</div>
                              <div class="line">The worst is this, that, at so slender warning,</div>
                              <div class="line">You are like to have a thin and slender pittance.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">It likes me well. Biondello, hie you home,</div>
                              <div class="line">And bid Bianca make her ready straight;</div>
                              <div class="line">And, if you will, tell what hath happened,</div>
                              <div class="line">Lucentio's father is arrived in Padua,</div>
                              <div class="line">And how she's like to be Lucentio's wife.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray the gods she may with all my heart!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">TRANIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Dally not with the gods, but get thee gone.</div>
                              <p>Exit BIONDELLO</p>
                              <div class="line">Signior Baptista, shall I lead the way?</div>
                              <div class="line">Welcome! one mess is like to be your cheer:</div>
                              <div class="line">Come, sir; we will better it in Pisa.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BAPTISTA</div>
                              <div class="line">I follow you.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <p>Exeunt TRANIO, Pedant, and BAPTISTA</p>
                        <p>Re-enter BIONDELLO</p>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Cambio!</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">What sayest thou, Biondello?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">You saw my master wink and laugh upon you?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">Biondello, what of that?</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Faith, nothing; but has left me here behind, to</div>
                              <div class="line">expound the meaning or moral of his signs and tokens.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">LUCENTIO</div>
                              <div class="line">I pray thee, moralize them.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
                              <div class="speaker">BIONDELLO</div>
                              <div class="line">Then thus. Baptista is safe, talking with the</div>
                              <div class="line">deceiving father of a deceitful son.</div>
                           </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="dialogue">
                           <div class="linegroup">
